188a1(mdo sde): dang slob mar yang 'gyur ro// de bzhin du grong dang mi dang ded dpon dang / mdun na 'don du'ang 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang / blon po dang / gzhon nu dang / grong dpon dang / 
188a2(mdo sde): tshogs thams cad kyi nang du yang sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid 'dum par sbyar ba dang / 'thun par byed do// lha thams cad du'ang 'gyur te/ de dag gi lta ba bzlog
188a3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ thams cad du skye ba ston pas de'i phyir skye ba'i rabs shes bya'o// sgyu ma byed pa'i sgyu ma mthong na/ kye ma sgyu ma byed pa ni sdig pa ste/ gcad pa dang gtub pa byed cing
188a4(mdo sde): gzhan la gsod do zhes tshogs thams cad la mi brjod pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na sgyu ma byed pa de'i rang bzhin yin par blta ste/ de bzhin du ngas sems
188a5(mdo sde): can rnams gsad pa yang shes par bya'o// sgyu ma byed pas sgyu ma byed pa'i skyes bu ji lta ba de bzhin du sgyu ma sprul pa nyis stong du gcig ma tshang ba yang de lta bus 'dul
188a6(mdo sde): ba'i dbang gis sgyu ma sprul to// 'jam dpal ji ltar mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma la ngas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgyu ma 'di dag sprul te/ kye ma btsun pa 'jam dpal
188a7(mdo sde): ni sbrang bu lta bu'i spyad pa spyod da/ mi'i glang po che shes kyang mi 'dod de/ shes kyang mi 'dod pa de ni sbrang bu lta bu ste/ smad pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen
188a8(mdo sde): pa thams cad gzigs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal sor mo'i phreng ba ji skad zer ba de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i
188b1(mdo sde): spyod pa ni de lta'o// 'jam dpal sor mo'i phreng ba 'di ni tha mal ba ma yin te/ de lta bus 'dul ba'i dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' mi'i glang po ches bdag nyid de ltar sprul to// 'jam dpal
188b2(mdo sde): yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang / sor mo'i phreng ba yang khyod dang 'dra ste/ sor mo'i phreng ba'i bdag nyid chen po shin tu rgyas par bstan gyis de'i gtam brjod pa las sor mo'i phreng ba'i che ba shes
188b3(mdo sde): bar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma'i glang po che sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don tu brtson 'grus bstan pa legaso
188b4(mdo sde): legs so// bdag nyid myur du dgra bcom pa thob par gyis shig dang de'i yon tan 'di 'dra'o// de'i las 'di 'dra'o// brtson 'grus 'di 'dra'o zhes sems can thams cad la phan
188b5(mdo sde): pa dang bde ba'i phyir brjod par bya'o// // bam po bzhi pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus
188b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la phan pa dang thugs brtse ba'i slad du dgra bcom pa rang gi lus 'di nyid kyis thob par 'tshal ba'i yon tan 'di 'dra/ 
188b7(mdo sde): las 'di 'dra/ brtson 'grus 'di 'dra'o zhes sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam pa ma dang brad nga/ 
188b8(mdo sde): dus su ma'i rum du bu chags ma thag tu pha ma dag dga' bar 'gyuraro// bdag gis myong ba'i yon tan gyis thob pas brtson 'grus dang gzi brjid gzhan du 'gyuraro// 'jig rten kyang 'byor pa dang
189a1(mdo sde): mod par 'gyur/ 'jig rten khrag khrug med par 'gyur/ rgyal po yang shin tu bde bar 'gyur/ bsod nams dam pa'i rmi lam yang rnyed de/ nam khye'u btsas pa de'i tshe/ 
189a2(mdo sde): rigs 'phel bar 'gyur ro// zhes mi mdzu ba rnams kyang shin tu byams par 'gyur ro// nam khye'u de lo bdun nam/ brgyad dam/ dgu lon nas yi ge'i grang zhugs pa'i tshe khyim na
189a3(mdo sde): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa mi 'byung / bran po dang / bran mo rnams kyang dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas/ yang dag pa'i las kyis khyim du 'phel bar byed do// nam khye'u de lo nyi shu lon pa
189a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe khyim de'i ba lang dang / ma he dang / lug la sogs dpa rkang pa bzhi pa rnams kyang 'thab pa med da/ pha ma lta bur sdug par 'gyur ro// ba yang zho bdag mo khye'u de
189a5(mdo sde): la 'dod chags dang / phrag dog dang / 'tshig pa dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / brdzun smra ba dang / tshig rtsu/ ba po dang / byis pa'i tshul dang / cho ga ma yin pa med
189a6(mdo sde): cing mi dag pa'i phyogs kyi bya ba thams cad mi 'byung ste/ pha ma la mchod pa dang / slob dpon dang / mkhan po la mchod pa'i sems skye'o// rgan rabs mthong na lag pa thal mo
189a7(mdo sde): sbyor rota bar ma mthong na pang gis 'khyud de dam du 'ju'o// khye'u dang bu mo bdag dang 'dra ba dang lan cig tu bus pa'i rtsed mo rtse na sbyin pa dang / ri mor bya ba dang / btong ba sems so// 
189a8(mdo sde): phongs pa la bu bzhin du byed do// bya ba kun la ngo tsha shes te/ 'jigs shing skrag pa yin/ dam pa'i chos kyi bya ba la mos kyi gar dang sgyu ma byed pa la mos pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas
189b1(mdo sde): mthong bar 'dod cing rtag tu glegs bam klog/ bslab pa la sogs pa bzo ba rnam pa mang po la dga'i/ brgyan po dang / rtsed mo dang / chang 'thung ba la dga' ba ma yin/ lha las lhur
189b2(mdo sde): byed pa skye bo dag pa rnams kyis bkur ba/ mi gnyid thul ba/ zas mang du mi za/ gtsang sbra chung ba ma yin/ phyi rol gyi 'gro ba thams cad kyang dga' ba/ chos kyi bya ba la snying stebs
189b3(mdo sde): che zhing blo gros che ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i yon tan shin tu mang bas rang gi lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom par 'gyur te/ yon tan de 'dra las de 'dra/ brtson 'grus kyi rnam pa de 'dra ste/ 
189b4(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu sor mo'i 'phreng ba yang myur du dgra bcom pa thob dpar 'gyur bas/ sor mo'i phreng ba la sdig par ga la 'gyur/ shA ra da \u0f7fsor mo'i phreng ba la ngo mtshar dang
189b5(mdo sde): yon tan gzhan yang yod de/ 'jam dpal ji lta ba de nga/ zhin du sor mo'i phreng ba byang chub sems dpa'i mi'i glang po yang de bzhin no// sor mo'i phreng ba ni sems can thams
189b6(mdo sde): cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sor mo'i phreng ba ni/ bdag grol nas 'jig rten thams cad dgrol lo// rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o// 
189b7(mdo sde): zhes bdag dang 'jig rten gyi phyir skyes bu 'di rtag tu smon lam 'debs te/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan zhing snying brtse ba/ sdig pa byed pa de ni gnas med do// de lta bu'i sems can
189b8(mdo sde): dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' mo'i glang po che rnams ni/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / tshangs pa lta bu dang / skya dgu'i bdag por 'gyur ro// sa dang rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / chu dang
190a1(mdo sde): me lnga pa dang / de lta bu rnam pa mang por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'i dgal gyi chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
190a2(mdo sde): sor mo'i phreng ba ni gang zag ya rabs lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu bdag nyid srid pa thams cad las nges par rgal to// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas gnas brtan moru
190a3(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de bzhin gshegs pa ma rnyed na/ 'jig rten na chos la bdag po byed pa'i sems can su dag yod/ smras pa/ 
190a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos mngon pa'i lung las bcom ldan 'das kyi/ sa rab tu bstan te/ dge slong rnams na ba dang na ba lta bu gsum ste/ na ba gsum gang zhe na/ log par
190a5(mdo sde): nges pa zhes bya ba dang / yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya ba dang / ma nges pa'i gang zag ces bstan to// de la/ log par nges pa gang zhe na/ log par nges pa zhes bya
190a6(mdo sde): pab ni skyes bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'dul po mi nus pa'o yang dag pa nyid du nges pa zhes bya ba ni dper na/ btsun pa 'jam dpal 'od srung chen po lta bu de bzhin gsheg pa ma
190a7(mdo sde): byung ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir de kho na'i chos la rab tu zhugs pa'o// smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes par btsun pa
190a8(mdo sde): gnas brtan 'od srung chen po bdag nyid de kho na'i chos la rab tu zhugs so zhes ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa ste/ gang chos la gnas pa de dag gi
190b1(mdo sde): khyim na de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs so// dper na 'bab chu thams cad ni char las byung ste/ char med kyang gal te chu 'bab pa de la mkhas pas 'di ltar bsam mo// char med par chu/ 
190b2(mdo sde): 'bab pa de ni gnas med kyis gzhan du char 'bab par rig par bya ste/ de las 'bab chu 'bab par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du mo'u dgal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das
190b3(mdo sde): pa'i mchog gi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas las 'bab ste/ de bas na btsun pa 'od srung chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhabs kyi drung du rab du 'byung bar rig par bya'o// ji ltar skye
190b4(mdo sde): bo thams cad kyi mi mthong zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'a/ das nyag gcig gis mkhyen pa ma yin gyi/ gzhan du char 'bab pa bzhin te/ de'i phyir sangs rgyas med pa'i
190b5(mdo sde): dus kyi sems can rnams kyang bdag nyid nges par mi sgrol gyi rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum du ngas par spro/ la bar rig par bya'o// gzhan yang btsun pa skye bu la la
190b6(mdo sde): zhig zla ba dang nyi ma mthong nas/ khyim gyi nang du zhugs nas de gnyis kyis mi mthong ngo snyam du sems na/ ci zla ba dang nyi mas mi mthong ngam/ mthong mod kyis mi mi mkhas pa khyim
190b7(mdo sde): gyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu zla ba dang nyi mas mi mthong ngo snyam du sems te/ de bzhin du btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu yang mi mkhas pa bzhin ma zer cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag
190b8(mdo sde): tu sems can rnams nges par sgrol te/ rtag tu sems can rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang bstan par rdzogs par 'dzin du 'jug go// de'i phyir gang zag log par nges pa dang / yang
191a1(mdo sde): dag pa nyid du nges pa ste/ mnges pa zhes bya ba gsum pa med do// smras pa// 'jig rten pa la yang tshul khrims lnga yod do// sangs rgyas 'thud pa'i sun yang
191a2(mdo sde): yod do// smras pa btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu da skad ma zer cig/ ci tsam chos dang 'thun pa'i tshul khrims dang / cho ga dang yon tan 'jig rten na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das
191a3(mdo sde): pa dag yod pa de dag thams cad du thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshig rab tu rig par bya'o// smras pa/ nad pa lta bu'i gtam rnam pa gsum ste/ nad pa kha cig sman pa rnyed na 'tsho ba yod do// 
191a4(mdo sde): nad pa kha cig sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tsho ba yod do// nad pa kha cig ni sman pa rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ba yod do// smras pa// na ba gsum du med de/ na ba kha cig sman pa ma rnyed
191a5(mdo sde): kyang 'tsho'o// na ba kha cig sman pa rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ste/ gsor rung ba dang / gsor mi rung ba dang rnam pa ga nyis so// smras pa/ gsum ma yin te/ nad pa
191a6(mdo sde): kha cig ni sman pa ma rnyed kyang 'tshe ba yod do// nad pa kha cig ni sman pa dang g.yog rnyed kyang mi 'tsho ba yod do// gal te sman med na sman pas kyang ci zhig bya/ nad pa gang sman pa ma rnyed
191a7(mdo sde): kyang 'tsho ba de sman pa rnyed na ji ltar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/ rgyu gcig gis sman pa bya ba shes pa ma yin gyi zas mi bza' ba'i cho ga btang ba yang shes so// gal ta thams cad mi shes na
191a8(mdo sde): dus ma yin par 'chi ba shi bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir nad pa gsor rung ba dang / gsor mi rung ba ste/ sman pa yang rnyad sman dang g.yog rnyed kyang / gal ta 'chi na de don med pa'i gnasu
191b1(mdo sde): 'gyu ro/ rded ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sman dang g.yog dang sman pa yang ma rnyed sman pa rnyed la/ sman ma rnyed pa ste/ de'i phyir sman pa dang / sman rnyed kyang mi 'tshon/ sman dang sman pa'i bye
191b2(mdo sde): brag kyang med do// ci'i phyir tshe'i rig byed las lus lci ba dang / yang ba'i bya ba thams cad 'byung ste/ de'i phyir btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gsor rung yang rung la/ mi rung yang mau rung
191b3(mdo sde): zhes bya bar rnam pa gsum du rtog pa rnam gsum med do// da ni nyan thos kyi shes pa ste/ sbrang bu lta bu shes pa'o zhes mkhas pa rnams 'dzer to// mi mkhas pa rnams kyi phyir rnam pa/ 
191b4(mdo sde): gnyi su brtags te/ de la log par nges pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod chen po'o// yang dag par nges pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi ngo mtshar
191b5(mdo sde): rnam pa gnyis te/ rnam pa gnyis gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dod chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog gi gan su ngo mtshar du gyur pa yin te/ de bzhin
191b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa las mtho ba'i gnas gzhan mi gda' ste ngo mtshar to// dma' ba'i gnasu yang 'dod mangs las gzhan mi snang ngo // dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams pha rol tu
191b7(mdo sde): phyin pa bcu yongasasu rdzogs par byed cing 'gro ba de bzhin du 'dod chen pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongasu rdzogs par byed cing 'gre'o// dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi sbyin
191b8(mdo sde): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag gi bu dang / mig dang / sha bya ba'i phung po ri rab pas che ba de bas lhag par gtong ba de bzhin du 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongasu rdzogs par bye'o// 
192a1(mdo sde): 'dod chen pa'ang nam yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du song ba de'i tshe der g.yem pa'i sems skye ste/ de'i tshe myur du bud med mang po 'byung ste/ bu mang po yang 'byung ste/ sems tsam
192a2(mdo sde): gyis bde ba lta 'thob par ga la 'gyur/ de nas myur du bdag gi bu bzang ba'i sems skyes nas za'o// yang las kyis bram ze'i gzugasu 'gyur te/ de slong ba rnams la yang bu byin te/ sbyin
192a3(mdo sde): ba de dag kyang bza'o// yang bdag nyid kyang thams cad za ste/ de ltar 'dod chen pa'ang 'dod chen gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su/ 
192a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par byed do// de'i phyir mthon po gnas kyi mchog ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so// dma' ba nga'i gnas na ni 'dod chen pa rnams so// btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi/ 
192a5(mdo sde): bu de ltar ngo mtshar rnam pa gnyis te/ log par nges par gang za/ ga ni 'dod chen pa yin par soms shig/ yang dag par nges pa'i gang zag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin
192a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i nyan thos yin par soms shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i 'phreng ba la bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i phreng ba tshur shog/ myur du rab tu byung la skyabs gsum du 'gro ba
192a7(mdo sde): zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas slar gsol pa/ theg pa 'di ni thag chen te// chags med ye shes zhes kyang bgyi// theg pa gcig po/ 
192a8(mdo sde): skyabs gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa don dam skyabs// chos dang sangs rgyas don gcig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku// dge 'dun de bzhin gshegs kyi ming // dag
192b1(mdo sde): 'dun gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs// chos dang dge 'dun gnyis ni thabs kyi skyabs lags te/ de bzhin gshegs ni thabs med skyabs dang don dam skyabs// de bzhin gshegs pa skyabs/ 
192b2(mdo sde): med rnams kyi skyabs lags te// de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs la skyabasu 'chi// ji ltar shing kun pa 'dod pas ni shing kun bza' bya zhes// shing kun yang dag bor nas shing kun bcos
192b3(mdo sde): ma za ba ni/ 'jig rten dag na bdag la mi phan nad kyang sos mi 'gyur// 'jig rten de 'dra'i phyogs med sman pa stong gis gso mi nus// de bzhin du ni skyabs gcig yongs btang ste// 
192b4(mdo sde): thabs kyi skyabs su gang dag 'jug pa yang // de lta bu'i sbrang bu gzhan med de/ de ni sangs rgyas stong gis gso mi nus// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'o na sor
192b5(mdo sde): mo'i 'phreng ba khyod gzhon nu'i tshul khrims srungs shig/ da/ nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar/ 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jig rten na gzhon nu gang lags
192b6(mdo sde): bsnyen pa rdzogs pa gang lags/ 'jig rten na dag sbyong gsel ba gang lags/ 'jig rten na sbyin gnas gang lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur pa dang / sor/ 
192b7(mdo sde): mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'jig rten skyabs gcig po/ don dam pa'i skyabasu ma 'tshal ba de dag thabs gnyis po la bkod do// 
192b8(mdo sde): de gnyis 'jig rten na skyabs lags te/ gzhon nur gyur nas bsnyen pa rdzogs pa mi gsal ba de dag dge sbyong lags sam gang skyabs gcig po ma 'tshal ba de dag skyabs sbyor bar lta ga la
193a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ gang bcom ldan 'das la don dam pa'i skyabs su ma 'tshal ba de dag thog ma nas skyabs su 'gro ba yang ma sbyangs na dge sbyong du lha ga la 'gyur/ de ltar skyabs su
193a2(mdo sde): mchi 'ang gsal bar ma 'tshal na// sbyin gnasu lta ga la 'gyur/ gang skyabs dang thabs kyi skyabs kyi bye brag ma 'tshal ba de dag ni 'jig rten na gzhon nu mi mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
193a3(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims srungs shig/ de nas sor mo'i phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni
193a4(mdo sde): srog gcod pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin gyi/ nyab ltar srog gcod pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin to// srog ces bgyi ba ni nyon mongs pa bya ba ste/ de dag bzung nas
193a5(mdo sde): gang gsod pa de ni 'jig rten na srog gcod pa spangs pa 'ardzi/ na pa'o// de yang bsad pa 'am yang na rgyags pa bcom ste/ bdag gi slob mar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
193a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod brdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'phreng bas slar 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni
193a7(mdo sde): brdzun smra ba spangs pa'i tshul khrims mi 'dzin to// chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste/ bdag ni mi bden par smra ba'i chos ston to// de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mi bden pa zhes bgyi'o// 
193a8(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos thams cad kyang brdzun zhes bgyi'o// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jig rten dang
193b1(mdo sde): 'thun pa'i rjesu 'jug pa rnams kyang mi bden pa'i chos zhes bgyi'o// bdag 'jig rten du skye ste rab tu byung zhing bsnyen pa rdzogs nas/ bdag gis dgra bcom pa thob bo// gzhan gyi sbyin par/ 
193b2(mdo sde): dngos po la spyad do// bdag 'jig rten na 'chag go/ bdag gi ni rmi dgu nas nga'i bgyi ba bgyi'o// bdag lham 'tshal lo// bdag gis so shing blang ngo // bdag gis mig rtsi byug go/ bdag
193b3(mdo sde): sgom mo// bdag gnyid mchog go/ bdag gi mgo brag so// bdag mal du zhugs te nyal lo// rkangad pa na ba zhig byung ngo // bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rlung dang / 'dus pa
193b4(mdo sde): zhig byung ste/ bdag gis sman btung ngo // bdag ni da shing zad pa'i ma bzhin du yongasu mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i chos thams cad ni mi bden pa ste/ ji tsam/ 
193b5(mdo sde): du thabs kyis bya ba dang / 'jig rten na thabs kyis bya ba la bdag yongasu spyod pa'i bar du brdzun smra ba'i tshul khri/ mas mi sbyong ngo // de kho na'i chos bden pa'i chos rab tu
193b6(mdo sde): bshad kyis nga las nyon cig/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bden pa yang dag pa nyid don dam pa'i sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ de bzhin gshegs
193b7(mdo sde): pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ thar zug gi sku/ rtag pa'i sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ zhi ba'i sku/ don dam pa'i sku/ chos kyi sku/ de kho
193b8(mdo sde): na las skyes pa'i sku de ji ltar stin/ de bas ni mi bden pa'i chos kyis 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa thams cad ni mi bden pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na sangs rgyas shes
194a1(mdo sde): bya'o// dper na ba lang rdzi dag be'u shi ba'i spags pas be'u ltar byas te bring nas/ be'u gzhan len tu 'jug pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi rjesu 'brang zhing spyod pa na/ sangs
194a2(mdo sde): rgyas ni 'on pa lta bur gyur nas chos ston te/ ba lang rdzi dang / ba ltar 'on pa rnams kyang bdag cag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'on pa yang 'jig
194a3(mdo sde): rten du byung ste/ bdag cag kyang 'on pa'o snyam ste shin tu dga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyang 'on pa snyam du sems shing bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur ro// snyam du sems so// 
194a4(mdo sde): chos de kho na'i gnas la des bdag nyid skul te/ de bzhi na gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad chos la 'god pa de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes so// gal te ba'u
194a5(mdo sde): dngos por slar bstan na/ banor yang mi rung / len tu yang mi rung ste/ ba lang rdzis be'u gso ba bstan te// rtsa spar gang sbyin nas mi bden pa'i chos la dul bar byed do// 
194a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du gal te sangs rgyas kyis ngo bo nyid su pa'i sku 'jig rten du brtan tu zin na/ sku de sus mthong bar nus te/ ji ltar ba lang rtsa'i chang ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad kyis rjesu 'brang ba'i
194a7(mdo sde): byed pas chos rnams bden pa ma yin no// de bas na sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du yan lag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams chos la rtsom par sems can mang po yongasu smin par
194a8(mdo sde): mdzad de/ de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do// de'i phyir bdag kyang mi bden pa'i chos la spyod da/ ji tsam du sems can thams cad mi bden pa yin pa de tsam du bdag kyang brdzun smra ba
194b1(mdo sde): spang ba'i chos mi 'dzin te/ de'i tshe bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod chang 'thung ba spangs pa'i tshul
194b2(mdo sde): khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigasu bcad pas gsol pa/ chang spong ba'i tshul khrims bdag mi 'dzin// chang las myos pa skyes pa'i
194b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims 'dzin// chang 'thungs pa ni nga rgyal skye bar brjod// 'gro 'chag rtag tu rab bde chang zhes bgyi// bad gshegs snying po thag pa che las skyes// khu ba 'thungs nas
194b4(mdo sde): skyes bu ngoms par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rta dag brtan ther zug ces// rab tu dga' ngoms ha ha/ legs brjod pa// phun sum tshogs pa de ni bdag thob
194b5(mdo sde): shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'on sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod 'khrig pa'i chos spong ba'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor mo'i 'breng bas bcom
194b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni 'khrig spangs pa'i tshul khrims 'dzin// rtag tu gzhan gyi bud med g.yem chags 'dzin// ba dan lta bur
194b7(mdo sde): smad 'tshong khyim na spyod// bud mang kun gyi drung du'ang rab tu chags// ting 'dzin ro ni bdag gi chung ma ste// chos gzhan dga' ba gzhan gyi bud med chags// dpa' zhing bdan la
194b8(mdo sde): dga' ba bdag gi bu// snying rje byams pa bu mo mang po ste// stong pa 'di ni bdag gi khyim lags so// mtha' yas pha rol phyin pa bdag gi mal// nyon mongs rnams ni bdag gi
195a1(mdo sde): g.yog lags te// zas ni ldem dag gsang ba bstun pa lags// bdag gi bskyed mos tshal ni gzungs rnams te// byang chub yan lag me tog dag gis brgyan/ 
195a2(mdo sde): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes 'bras bu ste// bdag gi chos kyi tshig ni sdong po lags// de la sogs pa khyim gnas rtse dga' mchog/ byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ma lags/ 
195a3(mdo sde): 'di ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rang bzhin chos// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas sor
195a4(mdo sde): mo'i 'brang bas bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad pas da slar gsol pa// bdag ni ma byin len spongs da khrims mi 'dzin// gzhan don rku ba'i tshul ni rtag tu 'dzin
195a5(mdo sde): ma byin pa ni byang chub lags shes bgyi// da ni sus kyang su la'ang ma stsal te/ byang chub shing drung bcom ldan bzhugs nas kyang // khyod kyis rnyed pa med
195a6(mdo sde): cing ba shig pa'ang med// de ni chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin te// de ni bla na med pa'i chos legs so// bcom ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod gar
195a7(mdo sde): dang rta nya rol mo spangs pa'i tshul khrims zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'brang bas tshigs su bcad pas slar 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni gar
195a8(mdo sde): mkhan bzhin du rtag tu gar bgyid de// dri za'i dbyangs snyan sgrog cing grublangs bro rdung ste// legaso la gso de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston// legs brjod gar bgyid
195b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos// mi sbyin lta bur sgra snyan theg chen mdo sde klag/ mi 'am ci dang dri za'i rnga dang rnga bran dang // sil snyan dag gis glegs bam la'ang mchod par bgyi/ 
195b2(mdo sde): sems can gang rnams de ltar rtag tu mchod bgyid pa// de dag 'jig rten du ni khor mor mi gcig par/ phyi dus sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes de bzhin gshegs pa gsung // de nas bco
195b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'o na sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod gcig ci shes slobs shig/ sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la slar 'di skad ces gsol to// ci gcig zhen/ 
195b4(mdo sde): sems can thams cad ni zas la gnas so zhes/ 1ngan thos kyi theg pa las byung ba'i tshig ste/ theg pa che na po la de lta bu'i rnam pa ma mchis so// theg pa chen po pa
195b5(mdo sde): rnams ni rtag tu mig mi 'dzums shing brtan pa'o// ci gcig zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhin ga shegs pa'i snying po la gnas pa'o// ci gnyis gang zhe na/ 
195b6(mdo sde): ming dang gzugs kyi tshig nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ba ste/ theg pa chen po la ma lags so// ming dang gzugs ni de lta lags te/ ming dang gzugs rnam pa gzhan ma lags so// 
195b7(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thar pa ni ming tsam ste/ gzugs dang dbyibs mi rig go/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thar pa ni lag mthil na skyu ru ri'i gzugs
195b8(mdo sde): bzhin no// ci gsum zhe na/ tshor ba gsum nyan thos kyi theg pa las 'byung ste/ theg pa chen po pa rnams kyi ma lags so// tshor ba 'di gsum ste/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa
196a1(mdo sde): pa rtag pa'i mchog la mi rtag par 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba'o// dge
196a2(mdo sde): 'dun mi snang bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba'i don thos pa ni tshor ba ste/ de gsum theg pa chen po'i tshor ba'o// ci bzhi zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i
196a3(mdo sde): tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la de lta bu ma mchis so// 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin dang byed pa rnams ni bden pa bzhi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag ces bgyi ba de ni theg pa chen po la shin tu bden pa ste/ 
196a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ni bden pa ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ther zug go zhes bgyi ba da ni shin tu bden te/ kun 'byung ba ni ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thar zug gi
196a5(mdo sde): mchog go zhes bgyi ba ni shin tu bden gyi 'gog pa ni ma lag sa so// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'o zhes bya ba da ni shin tu bden gyi lam ma yin te/ theg pa chen po la 'phags
196a6(mdo sde): pa'i bden pa de bzhi'o// sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden pa ma lagaso// sdug bsngal gyi bya ba bden du lags na/ sdug bsngal rnams bzhi bden par 'gyur te/ dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / 
196a7(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams kyi de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhir 'gyur ro// ci lnga gang zhe na/ dbang po lnga zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grag pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen
196a8(mdo sde): po la ni ma lags so// dbang po lnga ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar blta'o zhes ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni mig go// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o zhes thos nas
196b1(mdo sde): ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni rna ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i dri bsnams nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni sna'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i ro myangs nas ma tshang ba
196b2(mdo sde): med par bsgom pa de ni lce'o// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku'o zhes/ sku de ro'i mchog thos shing reg nas ma tshang ba med par bsgom pa de ni lus so// ci drug ce na/ skye mched drug ces nyan
196b3(mdo sde): thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ theg pa chen po la skye mched drug gi rnam pa 'di med do// skye mched drug ces bya ba ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa gsal bar blta ba'o zhes 'ong ba'i
196b4(mdo sde): sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni mig gi skye mched do// de bzhi dan gshegs pa rtag go zhes thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par bsgom pa de ni rna ba'i skye mched do// de bzhin
196b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i snying po'i rtag pa'i dri thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzog sa par bsgom pa de ni sna'i skye mched do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan pa thos pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs
196b6(mdo sde): par sgom pa de ni lce'i skye mched do// gang de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o zhes sku de'i blo dam pa nyan pa dang / reg pa 'ong ba'i sgo nas rdzogs par sgom pa de ni lus kyi skye mched do// gang de
196b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa gsal ba gsal bar ston pa la 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems kyis rdzogs par dad pa 'ong ba'i sgo'i skye mched de ni yid kyi skye mched do// ci bdun zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan
196b8(mdo sde): lag bdun zhes nyan thos kyi zag pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ zag pa chen po la yang bdun po de dag u dum 'bar ra'i me tog rgyas pa bzhin du rnyed par dka' ba'i tshig byang chub kyi yan lag
197a1(mdo sde): bdun po de dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas shin tu me tog rgyas pa bdun no// ci brgyad can/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces nyan thos kyi theg pa
197a2(mdo sde): la grags pa'i tshig ste/ zag pa chen po 'di las kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad po yang dag par lta ba la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i mchog
197a3(mdo sde): go zhes rab tu ston pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba thos shing rna bar reg pa tsam gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam yang dag
197a4(mdo sde): par 'thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa'i ther zug g.yung drang gi mchog bsil bar gyur pa/ shis dpa ni sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi
197a5(mdo sde): sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rga ba med pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad/ pa yin par rig par bya'o// ci dgu zhe na/ mdo sde
197a6(mdo sde): yan lag dgu pa zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ thag pa chen po 'di la ni thogs pa med pa'i ye shes theg pa gcig ces bya'o// ci bcu zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
197a7(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bcu zhes nyan thos kyi theg pa la grags pa'i tshig ste/ thag pa chen po 'di la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ma yin gyi/ mtha' yas pa'i stobs shes bya'o// 
197a8(mdo sde): de bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab cing bsam du med pa ste/ stobs mtha' yas par mnga' ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mdo sde mtha' yas
197b1(mdo sde): pab ldem po ngag tu ston pa'o// 'di ni lam gcig po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni theg pa gcig/ skyabs gcig/ bden pa gcig gi phyir 'brang ba/ khams gcig pa/ 
197b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba gcig pa/ kha dog gcig pa ste/ dbas na thag pa gcig ces bya'o// gzhan ni thabs kyi bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sor mo'i phreng ba la lelags
197b3(mdo sde): so zhes bya ba byin te/ leg so lag so sor mo'i 'phreng ba leg so// sor mo'i 'bring ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod tshur shog/ dge slong sor
197b4(mdo sde): mo'i 'breng po khyod tshur shog/ ces bka' stsal pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba dge slong lo mang du lon pa debazhin du thams cad dge slong dang 'thun par spyod lam mdzes
197b5(mdo sde): par gyur to// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcwa ma ldan 'das de bzhin du mchi'o zhes kha'i sgo nas tshig brung
197b6(mdo sde): ma thag tu der 'bras bu'i mchog dgra bcom pa thob bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba tshur shog/ 'dze ta'i tshal du sems can bye ba mang po sgrol
197b7(mdo sde): zhing ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du 'dong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sor mo'i 'brang ba dang thabs gcig tu shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u dgal gyi bu dang / 'jam dpal gzhon
197b8(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la sogs pas mdun du bdar cing / bstor te/ na mkha' la zla ba nya ba gzas bskor ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shing mya ngan med pa'i drang nas
198a1(mdo sde): na mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags te/ gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba rtsod pa'i sa nas/ 'dze ta'i tshal gyi bar du gnag pa'i dgongs
198a2(mdo sde): bzhi bcur 'dom gang med pa'i bar du gshegs so// de nas sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos
198a3(mdo sde): mchod pa char byas te/ 'dza ta'i tshal du 'ongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ro gshegs
198a4(mdo sde): ta de bzhin gshegs pa sang ge'i khri la bzhugs so// da nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil bzhin du gyur cing / gos ka tsa lin nga// 
198a5(mdo sde): ltar rag na bde ba 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du gyur to// de nas phyogs thams cad kyi byang chub/ sems dpa' sor mo'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ dang
198a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa seng ge'i stag chen po dang / thab mo chen po bkye nas sems can bye ba mang po sgrol zhing chos kyi gtam ston te/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba'i bdag nyid
198a7(mdo sde): chen po mthong bar 'gyur gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dang shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dag dang shig ces bkye ste/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba bltar lhags so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag phyogs
198a8(mdo sde): cha gang nas 'ong ba'i phyogs chad de dang de nas me tog sil ma shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi char bab bo// sems can gang dang gang dag gis pad+mo'i dril reg par gyur pa'i sems can de dag
198b1(mdo sde): thams cad nyon mongs pa med par gyur to// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / na mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / lha'i bu mo mang
198b2(mdo sde): pos lha'i mchod pa mang po byung te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi char yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ mgrin gcig tu tshigasu bcad pas 'di skad ces smras so// brgyad bzhi mtshan 'chang
198b3(mdo sde): yon tan rgya che mnga'// pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du zhal yang mdzes// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mdzes pa ltar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// thub pa dam pa bdun mtho
198b4(mdo sde): gzugs mchog mnga'// byams mchog pan pa'i yon tan mang po 'chang // pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du ma dzes pa'i zhal// nam mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// 
198b5(mdo sde): mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag dge mtshungs med mchog yangs yon tan mnga'// thub ba dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo mchog
198b6(mdo sde): rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhol// na mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzad spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// brtan dag mtshungs med mchog yangs yon tan mnga'// 
198b7(mdo sde): thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// na mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// 
198b8(mdo sde): zer zug dge mchog yon tan rgya chen mnga'// thub pa dam pa lha mi mchog gis mchod// pad+mo mchog rgyas bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// nam pa' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar/ 
199a1(mdo sde): mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// ni dge mtshungs myed mchog yangs yon tan mnga'// thub pa dam pa lnga mi mchog gis mchod/ 
199a2(mdo sde): pad+mo rgyas pa bzhin du mdzes pa'i zhal// na mkha' la ni zla ba mchog 'dra bar// mdzod spu thig le mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo// bzod 'chang tshul khrims yon tan mtha'
199a3(mdo sde): yas chang // sor ma'i 'bring thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// theg pa gcig 'dzin theg pa chen po ston// byams 'chang sor 'phreng khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas
199a4(mdo sde): lus 'dzin dag kyang mtha' yas 'dzin// mtha' ya ngas gsung 'dzin mtha' yas blo gros 'chang // sor mo'i 'phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas
199a5(mdo sde): 'od 'chang mtha' yas ldem ngag ston// sor mo'i/ 'phreng thogs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' ya sa sgyu 'chang mtha' yas bdud rnams 'dul// nyon mong/ 
199a6(mdo sde): bye ba rnam par smin byed 'chang // sor 'phreng thogs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' yas yongasu mya ngan 'da' byed cing // mtha' yas skye stong 'jig rten rjesu 'jug
199a7(mdo sde): dpa' bo mchog 'chang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la sor mo'i 'phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nga ni yang dag pa'i mthu
199a8(mdo sde): la gnas so zhes gsungs na/ de'i don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das khyod yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas te bzhugs pa ji lta bu lags// nga ni thar pa'i sa la gnaso// / 
199b1(mdo sde): zhes bka' stsal pa/ tshig de la dad par bgyir mi rung na/ 'di la de'i gtan tshigs bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba khyod/ 
199b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig du deng la 'di nas byang phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
199b3(mdo sde): dga' ba bskyod du med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros bskyed du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i
199b4(mdo sde): dbang phyug rgyal po da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'a dus mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin
199b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa bzhugs bzhin mi skye ba'i mtha' la gnas so zhes gsungs na/ ji lta bu lag sa zhes zhus shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu
199b6(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / ser mo'i 'phreng bas legs lag so zhes gsol nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis dang pa'i rgyal po ltar dga' ba bskyang du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
199b7(mdo sde): der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das blo gros bskyad du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba dar dong ste nye bar phyin nas/ de bzhin
199b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gnyis 'dir mchis pa de bzhin gshegs pa
200a1(mdo sde): shAkya thub pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas bkye ste 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa yongasu mya ngan las
200a2(mdo sde): ma 'das par de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du ma skyes pa'i mtha' thar pa la ji ltar gnas shes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das des 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa dang / sor me'i
200a3(mdo sde): 'phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gang yin pa nga nyid de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa de
200a4(mdo sde): nyid ston gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyed ded la bcom da ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag ngag 'di ltar bkye'o zhes smos shig/ de nas 'jam dpal
200a5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng ba gnyis lang sa te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo khos phyag 'tshal nas dga'o zhes smras te/ ngang pa'i rgyal
200a6(mdo sde): po bzhin du slar 'ongs so// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma de bzhin ga sh+ya
200a7(mdo sde): pa ni dpag tu ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mtha' yas so// kye ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba nyid bdag cag gis mthong ste// bcom ldan 'das de
200a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa/ blo gros bskyad du med pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nga yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
200b1(mdo sde): nyid ston to nas tshig brjod nas bdag cag slar bkye na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'din bzhugs bzhin du ji ltar ma skyes pa'i mtha' la gnas pa bstan du gsol/ bcom
200b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ji ltar blo gros bskyed du med pa yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sa'i dbang phyug rgyal por gyur cing / dga' ba bskyed du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na ji
200b3(mdo sde): ltar gnas pa 'di na 'dug bzhin du na ji ltar gnas 'di na 'dug la ma skyes pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas shas ma zer cig/ sangs rgyas kyi sku ni mtha' ya so// de bzhin gshegs/ 
200b4(mdo sde): pa ni mtha' yas par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshungs pa med pa'o// de bzhin gsheg/ ngas pa ni mtshungs pa med par rgyu ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom
200b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni dpag tu med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/  dpag tu med par rgyu ba'o// sor mo'i 'phreng / ba ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma skyes par gyur pa de'i
200b6(mdo sde): drodrin de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / sangs rgyas ston par 'gyur ro// de nas sor mo'i 'phreng bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
200b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la thugs brtsa ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sor mo'i 'phreng ba ngas
200b8(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya stong phrag bcur pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pas sems can yang dag par bsdus te/ sems can byang chub kyi sems ma skyes sems can bye ba mang po byang chub la bkod // 
201a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba des nga'i lus bskal pa bye ba mang po grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa dang de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas ma skyes pa'i bskur gyur to// sor mo'i 'brang bas
201a2(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba'i skur gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logasu
201a3(mdo sde): gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba de bzhin ga
201a4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes so// soradamo'i 'phreng ba khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan
201a5(mdo sde): cig du ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i 'jig/ rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad
201a6(mdo sde): bzhugs par dang la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ 
201a7(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sor mo'i 'phreng bas leg so zhes gsol nas/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rkang pas ma byung ba'i glog gi 'phreng ba'i
201a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams der dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ 
201b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin du zhus pa dang / snga ma bzhin du 'dir lhags nas sor mo'i 'breng ba dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa/ 
201b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar na ma byung ba'i mtha' la gnas pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sor mo'i 'brang ba ngas bskal pa brgya
201b3(mdo sde): stong mang por pha rol tu phyin pa bcus/ sems can yang dag par bsdus te/ sngon ma byung ba'i bde ba la rab tu bkod pas nga'i lus bskal pa bya ba mang por tshad med grangs med pa'i
201b4(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa las ma byung lus su gyur to// sor mo'i 'phreng bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na 'dus ma bgyis kyi mtha' la gnas/ bka' stsal pa/ 
201b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logasu gang / ga'i klung gsum bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la/ ngas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yid 'phrog ces bya ba
201b6(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas blo gros mi zad pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas kyis// de bzhin gshegs
201b7(mdo sde): pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhi nga 'di nas byang phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma
201b8(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba ni rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
202a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris
202a2(mdo sde): shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams zab mo
202a3(mdo sde): rgyal po zhes bya ba de na/ zab mo'i mchog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gang shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin
202a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logs su
202a5(mdo sde): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma drug snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'ang / sa pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams rlung zhes bya ba/ de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
202a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros kyi 'tsho ba 'byung ba zhes bya pa da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de ba zhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya
202a7(mdo sde): thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa snga ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bdun snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
202a8(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams rdo rje blo gris zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te
202b1(mdo sde): 'tsho ning gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas byang byos/ 
202b2(mdo sde): log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba ngan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong/ 
202b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar/ 
202b4(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o//  sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang phyogs logasu gang dga'i klung gi bye ma dgu snyed kyo 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
202b5(mdo sde): pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba mchog ces bya ba da ltar
202b6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs
202b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas bang phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma shar ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs
202b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs bdal ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya
203a1(mdo sde): thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// // bam po lnga pa/ 
203a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bro dam pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
203a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bro mchog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gsheg pa de la
203a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phye dgas log su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
203a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtsa lag 'tsho zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshog/ sa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
203a6(mdo sde): rtsa lag 'tsho ba'i 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs
203a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'brang bas bsgos pa zhes bya ba ngan// de
203a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i dri gcod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dal
203b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na
203b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ta ma la'i 'dab ma zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhun
203b3(mdo sde): te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu gang / 
203b4(mdo sde): ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na / 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
203b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar ba/ zhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gan
203b6(mdo sde): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams a ga ru dang ldan pa zhe/ 
203b7(mdo sde): bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a ga ru'i dri zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
203b8(mdo sde): pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
204a1(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye mas bsgoms pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phye ma'i spros
204a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs
204a3(mdo sde): log sa gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skar ma zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/ 
204a4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i 'od ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa
204a5(mdo sde): dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i
204a6(mdo sde): blo gros zhes bya ba de na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtshos byin pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin
204a7(mdo sde): gang shegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs log su gang gi'i klung bcu'i ba ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
204a8(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams klu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
204b1(mdo sde): ta 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
204b2(mdo sde): snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan chen zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan gyi 'od
204b3(mdo sde): ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs
204b4(mdo sde): su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprin chen po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
204b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas sprin chen po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhug/ sa te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshags pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa
204b6(mdo sde): dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba
204b7(mdo sde): da nade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog sbyin zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan
204b8(mdo sde): 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi kham
205a1(mdo sde): rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe
205a2(mdo sde): zhing gnyis kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs legasu gang ga'i klung lngan
205a3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'gro ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
205a4(mdo sde): rgyas 'gro ba 'dzin pa'i dbang po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te'atsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris
205a5(mdo sde): shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs su gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu 'dzin
205a6(mdo sde): ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nor bu 'dzin 'chang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin
205a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa da la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
205a8(mdo sde): khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' ldan pa zhes bya ba den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na mkha' dang mtshungs
205b1(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
205b2(mdo sde): 'di nas lho phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
205b3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dul ba'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das
205b4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs log su gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig
205b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ da bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa/ ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba
205b6(mdo sde): ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas lho phyogs logs
205b7(mdo sde): su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bya ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sang ga'i blo gros zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
205b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
206a1(mdo sde): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
206a2(mdo sde): 'jam pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snyan pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin ga
206a3(mdo sde): pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
206a4(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i 'phreng ba zhi sa bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gis byin
206a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan/ 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs
206a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba da na/ 
206a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu blo gros zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom
206a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 
206b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho
206b2(mdo sde): zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs legasu gang ga'i
206b3(mdo sde): klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
206b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas me tog mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhu rags te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs dpad la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
206b5(mdo sde): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
206b6(mdo sde): bzang po can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba tsam po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis/ de// 
206b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
206b8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mig gi bdag po zhes bya ba dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig gi rgyal po
207a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi ning
207a2(mdo sde): 'di nas/ nub phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
207a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ka'i l-i sa'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
207a4(mdo sde): ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs log su gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
207a5(mdo sde): rnga sgra zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra brtsa ma po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnga da byangs shes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ 
207a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
207a7(mdo sde): gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sdug pa'i mchog ces pa
207a8(mdo sde): ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub byang gi phyog/ 
207b1(mdo sde): mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba 'phel ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
207b2(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba 'bal ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ 
207b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes sdug ces bya ba da na/ 
207b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas mdzes pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom
207b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sa/ ngas rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs ma tshams log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig
207b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyu'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar
207b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs
207b8(mdo sde): mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spyod pa yid 'phrog ces bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
208a1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa'i mchog ces bya ba ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das
208a2(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na
208a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams sems can dang 'dra ba zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems can gyi mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs
208a4(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dri ngas shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi
208a5(mdo sde): phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi/ khams glog ces bya ba dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa
208a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glog gi bla ma zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa
208a7(mdo sde): ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
208a8(mdo sde): khams yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing
208b1(mdo sde): gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang
208b2(mdo sde): ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
208b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas tshad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tshe zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgya/ 
208b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya
208b5(mdo sde): ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtan pa'i mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin
208b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma
208b7(mdo sde): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chu'i ro zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chu'i mchog ces
208b8(mdo sde): bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang
209a1(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su ga gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog can ces byu ba den// de bzhin
209a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin po che'i tog lo dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang go'i klung gnyis kyi
209a3(mdo sde): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i 'od ces bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu bsgril ba zhes bya ba la dris shig pa gong ma
209a4(mdo sde): bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ bya/ dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
209a5(mdo sde): nata'ajig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba lo dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// / 
209a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces
209a7(mdo sde): bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig/ ba'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
209a8(mdo sde): log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser mdog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsor 'od gsal zhes
209b1(mdo sde): bya ba dris shig/ pa'ang lA ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
209b2(mdo sde): po narta'ajig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser mchog ces bya ba la'ang dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// 
209b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can
209b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa can gyi 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma ba zhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang
209b5(mdo sde): shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa'i chu zhes bya ba da na
209b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gaushegs pa chu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung
209b7(mdo sde): dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims kyi snying po zhes bya ba
209b8(mdo sde): la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
210a1(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gling zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen byung zhes bya ba la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar
210a2(mdo sde): gnas pa dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
210a3(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung gnas shes bya ba dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gi ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi
210a4(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas shar lho phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das dpa na// 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas thams cad
210a5(mdo sde): ces bya ba dan/ de bzhin gshag pa sangs rgyas kyi blo gros tog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi
210a6(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams blo gros grub pa zhes bya ba de na/ 
210a7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa don grub dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bya
210a8(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i baiDUR+Ya zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin
210b1(mdo sde): du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams skyes bu klu la
210b2(mdo sde): dga' bi zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu ku'i snying po la dris shig pa'ang gang ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lde'i phyogs mtshams lag
210b3(mdo sde): su gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ro zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos brtsegs pa zhes bya ba la dris
210b4(mdo sde): shig pa'ang ging me bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni dang 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang dga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
210b5(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spros ldan zhes bya ba ngan/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi snying po zhes bya ba la tri/ sa shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi
210b6(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams drang po'i 'od ces bya pa da na/ de bzhin gshags pa
210b7(mdo sde): drang po'i dpal zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams gang gi'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
210b8(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin thang med pa zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin thang med pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi
211a1(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams log su gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas gtsug
211a2(mdo sde): bud can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs
211a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba de na
211a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogadas pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyu
211a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasugang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi kha mas 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa'i
211a6(mdo sde): mig ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// 
211a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me'i gzi brjid
211a8(mdo sde): ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mo'i 'od ces bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
211b1(mdo sde): 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa sel ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin ga/ 
211b2(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mun pa sel ldan zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs
211b3(mdo sde): mtshams log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams byin pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
211b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtsham/ 
211b5(mdo sde): logasu gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi skye ba zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
211b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skye ba'i dbang phyug la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang
211b7(mdo sde): ga'i klung bdun gyi bya ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
211b8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che'i rnam par gnon pa la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i
212a1(mdo sde): klung brgyad rtsi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi snod ces bya ba den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
212a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi snod rgyal po la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'odi nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logasu gang ga'i klung
212a3(mdo sde): dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
212a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dga' ba la dris shig pa'ang gong ma bzhin du bsdu'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ lho// nub kyi phyogs mtshams log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye
212a5(mdo sde): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
212a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal dam pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas
212a7(mdo sde): pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogasu gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig rten mthong ba dang bcas
212a8(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba da na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad mthong na dga' ba cher 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam
212b1(mdo sde): par sprul pa'i bkod pago cha chen po bgos pa/ sa'i dbang phyug rgyal po thams cad la 'od byed snang ba'i sgo zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
212b2(mdo sde): ba de labacom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ stang gi phyog su gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
212b3(mdo sde): 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba da
212b4(mdo sde): ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gnas kyis/ de bzhin gshog sa pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gunas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 
212b5(mdo sde): stang gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gsum gyi bya ma ste da kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rte/ snyan gyi khams chus ma tog kha 'bya ba zhes bya ba de na
212b6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kha 'bye ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa da la// 
212b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas steng gi phyogasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig
212b8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan thams cad med pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
213a1(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
213a2(mdo sde): nas ta steng gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la mthing ka zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
213a3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das
213a4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs logasu gang dga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 
213a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba da na/ de ba/ zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs
213a6(mdo sde): te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas// steng gi phyogs log su gang
213a7(mdo sde): ga'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na// 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu da dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba com pa yang dag par rdzogs
213a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kun mu ta'i snying po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ 
213b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa kI'i spos zhes bya ba de na/ 
213b2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ki'i spos zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom
213b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ stong gi phyogs legasu gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 
213b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ko kang si ka zhes bya ba da na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo dgas pa'i sangs rgyas bkra shis thams cad kyi rgyal po zhes
213b5(mdo sde): bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes kyis/ da ba zhin gshegs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
213b6(mdo sde): 'di nas/ steng gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsod nams kyi stegs can zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin
213b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsod nams kyi stegs kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhas kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
213b8(mdo sde): ba de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ji ltar gnas pa'ang dris shig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogasu gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa
214a1(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams seng ge'i tshul zhes bya ba den/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rnam par rol pa cwa
214a2(mdo sde): bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams stag gi bug ces
214a3(mdo sde): bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas stag sgra sgrogs shes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas// 'og gi phyogs logasu gang
214a4(mdo sde): ga'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dangs pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shing sa ha ka ra zhes ra bya ba dan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
214a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa ha ka ra'i me tog rlungazhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 3ga gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi
214a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ldan zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad las/ 
214a7(mdo sde): rgyal bar 'dul ba zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logasu gang ga'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ya
214a8(mdo sde): shes mi chags pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thag pa chen po rnam par sgrogs pa'i rgyal po zhes
214b1(mdo sde): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dri nas/ 'og gi phyogs log su gang ga'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma pa' 'jigs 'thung gnas
