297a7(mdo sde): stsol pa mi'u dgal gyi bu de lta bas na rnam grangs 'das kyang chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ khyad par yang med/ tha dad du dbyer yang mang po de ltar rig par
297a8(mdo sde): bya'o// mo'u dgal gyi bu chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag na so so'i sgo ba rnams la yang bdang par dbye bar mi 'dod na/ sangs rgyas
297b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi stong pa/ kun du brtags pa dang / yongasu brtags pa las byung
297b2(mdo sde): ba stede dag la ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du rnam par bsgrub mod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings ni skye ba yang med/ 'jigs pa yang med do// mo'u dgal gyi bu chos kyi dbyings de ni/ 
297b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin du thugasu chung du/ de thugasu chud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu gcig nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de
297b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa dge/ slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston la/ de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mi sha so// mo'u
297b5(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhog gi gling chen da bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ts+tsha 'am/ mi 'am/ de ma yin pa'i skye ba'i gnas na
297b6(mdo sde): gnas pa ji snyed pa'i sems can du dag thams cad kyi mdun dud bzhin gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
297b7(mdo sde): bcas pa yang dag par ston la/ de dag kyang gcig gos gtsog mi shes// mo'u dgal gyi bu gleng chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams lha no/ 
297b8(mdo sde): gi mo'u dgal gyi bu nan gyis dper byas na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can du bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med pa
298a1(mdo sde): ma'i lus thob par gyur la/ mo'u dgal gyi bu sems can mir gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas/ 
298a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston par mdzad la/ de dag kyang gcig gis gcig mi shes so// mo'u dgal gyi bu stong gsum gyi
298a3(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog gi/ mo'u dgal gyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems ca
298a4(mdo sde): du smos pa gang yin pa'i sems can gyi khams ni ches mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de ltar ma yin no// de de bzhin du lto dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs dang / byo/ 
298a5(mdo sde): mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ na/ sems can du smos pa gang yin pa'i sems
298a6(mdo sde): can gyi khams ni ches mang gi so'i khams ni de ltar ma yin no// mo'u dgal gyi bu nan gyis dper byas na/ sems can de dag thams cad kyis snga phyi med par mi'i lus
298a7(mdo sde): thob par gyur kyang / mo'u dgal gyi bu sems can de dag thams cad la yang / de bzhin gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig nas re re'i mdun du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong
298a8(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun dang bcas par yang dag par ston la/ sems can de dag kyang gcig gis cig mi shes so// mo'u dgal gyi bu phyogs bcur gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'jig rten
298b1(mdo sde): gyi khams dag na/ sems can 'khod pa rnams lta zhog gi/ mo'u dgal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdan 'dri la bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pa dang / 
298b2(mdo sde): thogs pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa rnams gzigs te/ de dag ni ngas kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ma nyams pas/ bskal pa 'bum du yang / dper blangs
298b3(mdo sde): pa bgrangs pa'i tshul gyis bstan par sla ba ma yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dadag ni de tsam du dpag du med do// ngas gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du gang gzigs pa dang / 
298b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas dpar blang ba bgrangs pa dag gis bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar gyur pas kyang / shes
298b5(mdo sde): pa'am gzhal ba 'am/ brtag par slab ma yin na nyan thos rnams kyis lta ci smos te/ de bzhin ga shegs pa 'ba' shig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dadag
298b6(mdo sde): brgya phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / stong phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / 'bum phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / bye ba 'bum phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / gtams phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / 
298b7(mdo sde): dgrogs phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / mi 'khrugs phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / grangs med pa drag ji stong dang / dpag tu med pa phrag ji snyed yod pa dang / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snang
298b8(mdo sde): brag ji snyed yod pa dang / stong gsum gyi rdul phra rab rdul yongasu gang ba ji snyed yod pa mkhyen to// mo'u dgal gyi bu sangs rgyas kyi spyan slob pa med pa dang / thogs pa me pas/ 
299a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ sems can du bsdu bar bsdus shing smos pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams ni ches
299a2(mdo sde): mang gi Dasa'i khams ni da lta ma yin te// sems can de dag thams cad kyis snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ thob nas kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
299a3(mdo sde): gyur teTa'akhor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ra ra la yang de snyed kyi 'khor yod par gyur kyang / mo'u dgal gyi bu 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams
299a4(mdo sde): cad la de bzhin gshegs pas spu'i khung bu gcig na/ da re re'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston la/ 
299a5(mdo sde): gcig gis cig kyang mi shes te/ rang gi de bzhin gan gas pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du spu'i khung puH/ mas cad nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge
299a6(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yang dag par ston kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul po'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i cha'am/ stong gi cha 'am/ 
299a7(mdo sde): 'bum gyi cha'am/ bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha 'am/ grangs sam/ cha 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ dpa'am/ rgyu tsam yang yang dag par bstan par mi 'gyur te/ mo
299a8(mdo sde): dgal gyi bu de ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / ye shes dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// ma'u dag
299b1(mdo sde): gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po gang gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang / rin po che sna bdun
299b2(mdo sde): thob pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mang ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ me'i dag la
299b3(mdo sde): gyi bu khyod mos par bya'o// khong du chud par bya'o// sems can 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po da bas ches mang ba'i bsod
299b4(mdo sde): nams kyi phung pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khu/ dang pu gcig yongasu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag la
299b5(mdo sde): gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba dang 'di ltar che bar grags pa dang / 'di ltar mthu
299b6(mdo sde): che ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa lags par rnyed lagaso// de lta lags kyis kyang bdag ni rgyu'i rjesu 'gro ba'i chos thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes 'di lta
299b7(mdo sde): bu las dman par gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos nas/ lan cig/ 
299b8(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i sems can de dag kyang rnyeng pa legs par rnyed lags na/ gang dag mos par bgyid la mos shing yid chas nas kyang / rdzu 'phrul dang / ye shes 'di
300a1(mdo sde): lta bu yongasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ sems can
300a2(mdo sde): dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na phyag bgyi ba'i gnas lags so// bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu de bzhin te/ khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin du/ sems can gang
300a3(mdo sde): dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams la yid ches pa de dag gis ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de dag ni log par ltung ba'i dogs pa med par shes par bya'o// 
300a4(mdo sde): de nas lha de dag dang / klu de dag dang / brgya byin de/ de dag dang / tshangs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das las sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i
300a5(mdo sde): cho 'phrul 'di thos nas/ tshig 'thun par sangasargyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tsham// phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gang dag gis
300a6(mdo sde): shes 'di lta bu yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir sems bskyed pa 'am/ skyed par 'gyur ba de dag la yong phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar da ltar na de bzhin gshegs par rnam
300a7(mdo sde): par 'phrul pa de bzhin du/ de dag kyang rnam par 'phrul par 'gyurate/ de bas na bdag cag gis 'di la som nyi 'am/ yid gnyis sam/ the tsam za bar mi bya'o// 
300a8(mdo sde): zhes ched du brjod pa tshad du brjod do// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za de dag dang / brgya byin de dag dang / tshangs pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'ongs/ 
300b1(mdo sde): la mchod pa bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir sil snyan 'bum sgra phyung ngo // lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu dang / pad+ma dkar
300b2(mdo sde): po dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas thams cad la mngon par gotor to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na/ sngon bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
300b3(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed pa'o lha khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sems bskyed da/ tshig 'di skad du ji ltar da ltar na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sgrogs pa de bzhin du bdag
300b4(mdo sde): cag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ lha dang bcas pa 'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du bla na med pa'i seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par gyur cig ces smraso// de nas btsam/ 
300b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lha'i bu zla ba dang / zla mchog gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam
300b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / glog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig/ 
300b7(mdo sde): bskyed par 'gyur lags/ da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba dang / zla mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu rigs kyi
300b8(mdo sde): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sa nyid kyang 'chang la/ gzhan dag la yang ston pa da ni/ dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa
301a1(mdo sde): yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems skyed par mi 'gyur te/ 
301a2(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ba' shig tu sems skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu rgya chen po la mos pa dbang po rnon po// 
301a3(mdo sde): sngon gyi rgyal pa la lhag par bya ba byas pa rnams ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dga' ba skye bar 'gyur gyi chung ngu la mos pa rnams ni de ltar ma yin no// lha'i bu rnam
301a4(mdo sde): grangs 'das na/ gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ra ba dang / klog pa rnams ni tso nas dkon mchog ga/ sum gyi rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir gnas pa yin pa
301a5(mdo sde): de ltar rig par bya'o// lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ gnas pa de'i bsngags pa'i mtha' 'am/ bsod
301a6(mdo sde): nams kyi mtha' sangs rgyas 'bus sku tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs kyang bstan pa 'am/ bshad par spyod dom// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so// bka'
301a7(mdo sde): stsal pa lha'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang / gzhan dag la ston pa de bsod nams tshad med pa skyed par 'gyur bar mkhas pa nga
301a8(mdo sde): ltar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci
301b1(mdo sde): lags/ 'ang ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkur stsal pa/ byams pa der phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang sus su rtsa gsum gyi le'u nas bya/ 
301b2(mdo sde): par zung shig/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha'i bu
301b3(mdo sde): zla ba dang / zla mchog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshangs pa de dag dang / brgya byin de dag
301b4(mdo sde): dang rnalha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bca sa pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par spyod do// / 
301b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg ba chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan pa pradz+nyA bar ma dang / 
301b6(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo che ba bin d+he yang shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du// Ar+ya ma hA
301b7(mdo sde): shru ta ma na ma ma hA yA na sU tra// bid skad du/ 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
301b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dka' ra ba na/ 
302a1(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lhung bzed
302a2(mdo sde): thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la song ngo // mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la 'gro ba na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ khang pa brtsegs pa chen po phyi nang byugs
302a3(mdo sde): shing byi dor byas pa/ sgo gtan legs par bcug pa/ skar khung bcad pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ gang zhig gis khang po brtsegs
302a4(mdo sde): pa 'di lta bu zhig byas te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi/ dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed pa dang gang zhig gi/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das
302a5(mdo sde): pa'i ring bsrel yongs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du btsug ste/ srog shing kha ba tsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgyo shug gi lo ma
302a6(mdo sde): tsam 'dogs par byed pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byang na/ de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams ches mang du 'phel sA mo// 
302a7(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mnyan yod nas bsod snyoms las slar 'khor nas/ zon zas te/ zas phyi ma spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag
302a8(mdo sde): ta rkang pa bkrus nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba dar song te/ byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 
302b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'di na bdag snga dro gas thabs dang chos gos
302b2(mdo sde): bgos te/ lhung gzed thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la mchis te/ btsun pa bdag mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la mchis pa na/ khang pa brtsegs pa chen
302b3(mdo sde): po slad nang byugs shing / byi dor bgyis pa/ sgo gtan legs par stsal pa/ skar khung bkum pa zhig mthong lags so// mthong nas kyang bdag nyid 'di snyam
302b4(mdo sde): du sems te/ gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa 'a di lta bu zhig bgyis te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slo/ rang gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar bgyid pa dang / gang
302b5(mdo sde): zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rteni gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du sprul te/ srog
302b6(mdo sde): shing khab tsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par bgyid pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang pa tsam zhig bgyid na
302b7(mdo sde): de gnyis las gang gis bsod nams chas mang du 'phel snyam bgyid lags te/ bcom ldan 'das la bdag don 'di yingasu zhu lag so// de skad ces gsol ba dang // 
302b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo lagaso// kun dga' bo khyod gang zhig gis khang pa brtsegs pa da lta bu
303a1(mdo sde): zhig byas te/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed la/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel
303a2(mdo sde): yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug te/ srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa 'am/ 
303a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/ de gnyis las gang bsod nams ches mang du 'phel zhes bya ba ni/ khyod kyi zhu ba bzang la spobs pa
303a4(mdo sde): lags ste spyod pa dge'o// kun dga' bo de'i phyir la gas par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas bshad do// kun dga' bo gang zhig khang pa bcan
303a5(mdo sde): pa de lta bu zhig byas nas/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la 'bul bar byed la/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i
303a6(mdo sde): ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug te/ srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgya shug gi lo ma tsam 'dogs par
303a7(mdo sde): byed pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/ kun dga' bo bsod nams 'di la/ bsod nams snga ma nges brgya'i char yang nye bar mi
303a8(mdo sde): 'grostong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / dpar dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de tsa'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
303b1(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / 
303b2(mdo sde): shes rab dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// kun dga'
303b3(mdo sde): bo 'dzam bu'i gling chu zheng dang / rgyar dpag tshad bdun stong yod pa 'di/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams
303b4(mdo sde): dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'di lta ste/ 'bras sA lu'i zhing nga ma/ til gyi zhing ngam/ smig mo'i tshal lam/ 'das
303b5(mdo sde): bu'i tshal lam/ bu ram gi shing gi tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur pa de dag la/ mi la la zhig gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos gis dang / bsod snyoms dang / 
303b6(mdo sde): mal cha dang / nad kyi gso sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis ci 'dod pa stabs te/ de dag thams cad yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mchod rten byas te/ gdugs
303b7(mdo sde): dang rtasil snyan dang / ba da na dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dag gis mchod pa byed la/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa
303b8(mdo sde): yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bumo pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/ srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas/ gdugs rgya
304a1(mdo sde): shug gal ma tsam 'dogs par byed pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs tshon gang tsam zhig byed na/ kun dga' bo bsod nams 'das/ bsong
304a2(mdo sde): nams snga ma des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// nga tsa'i phyir zhen/ 
304a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / 
304a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab dpag tu/ med pa dang / rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu
304a5(mdo sde): med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo shar rgyu sa 'phags glang chu nang dang / rgyar dpagi tshad ba rgyang stong yod pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyi gang / 
304a6(mdo sde): bar gyur ces bya ba nas/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa zhes bye ba'i bar du rgya cher snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o// kun dga' bo nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling
304a7(mdo sde): chu zhing dang / rgyar dpag tshad dgu stong yod pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur ces bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// kun dga' bo byang gi sgra
304a8(mdo sde): mi snyan gyi gling chu nang du dpag tshad khri yod pa/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis gang bar gyur ces po nas/ snga ma bzhin du rgyas par sbyar ro// kun dga' bo lha'i dbang
304b1(mdo sde): brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba/ ka brgyad khri bzhi stong rab tu brtan pa dag yod do// ka ba de dag thams cad kyang lha'i baiDUn sngon po yin te/ kun dag
304b2(mdo sde): bo khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba gser gyi bye ma bdal pa la/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa/ gsar gyi dra bas g.yogs shing / ga ser gyi dril bu g.ye re kas
304b3(mdo sde): bskor ba ste/ kun dga' bo gang zhig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khang bzangs de lta bu sha stag gis bkang ste/ phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun
304b4(mdo sde): la 'bul bar byed la/ gang zhig gis de bzhin gshe gas pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba nas/ rgya cher snga ma bzhin
304b5(mdo sde): du sbyar ro// kun dga' bo lus 'phags mo'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ pa rgyun tu zhugs pa bsad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la
304b6(mdo sde): mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ sku gdung gi brgyad cha la bkur bsti bya ba dang / bla maro bya ba dang / ri mi ra byi ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / gsil bar bya ba
304b7(mdo sde): la brtson par 'gyur ro// zhes sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i dag pa'i las de ngas byas pas/ sems can dmyal bar lan cig song nas/ las de nyid dang / dge ba'i
304b8(mdo sde): rtsa ba de nyid dang / sngon legs par spyad pa de nyid kyis/ de nas thar nas bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar mi 'gyur la/ skra dang kha spu brags nas/ gos ngur smrig bgo/ 
305a1(mdo sde): / te/ yang dag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ rang byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur te/ rang sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar
305a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med pa'i chos 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/ tshul
305a3(mdo sde): khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i
305a4(mdo sde): phyir ro// kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sadas rgyas rnams dpag tu med pa'i chos rnams dang
305a5(mdo sde): ldan pa de'i phyir/ de la mchod pa'i rnam par smin payang da ltar dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa chen po
305a6(mdo sde): 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mitho na nub phyogs dma'// nub phyogs mtho na/ sha ro phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang
305a7(mdo sde): phyogs mtho na/ lho phyogs dmar/ dbus mtho na mthe'i dma'/ mtha' mthon// dbus dma' bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun ngos
305a8(mdo sde): bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
305b1(mdo sde): pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi'i rnga zhes bya bar zung shig/ sgra chen po zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom
305b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod de/ rje su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabaso la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba
305b3(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // 'phags pa sgra chen po zhes bye ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / 
305b4(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang / lo tsA ba ban d+ha dge ba dpal gyi bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ha ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he de pa
305b5(mdo sde): tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ye pra tI sa mud pa'i nga na ma/ ma hA yAn sU tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa rten cing
305b6(mdo sde): 'bral bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
305b7(mdo sde): nabacom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i nang na/ ar mo nig lta bu'i rdo lab rta thul la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rnams dang / 'phags pa byams pa dang / 
305b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pas brgyan pa
306a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / 
306a2(mdo sde): dri za'i rgyal po gtsug pud lnga pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ 
306a3(mdo sde): bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzer nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri rab kyi rtse mo la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ 
306a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha 'di dag ni/ mchod rten ba dad par 'tshal ba sha stag te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir
306a5(mdo sde): mchis ni/ ci nas tshangs pa'i bsod nams 'phru la ba dang / lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong dang / 
306a6(mdo sde): bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las/ dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ba da lta de ltar/ bcom ldan 'dra
306a7(mdo sde): kyis de dag la chos bston du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshigasu bcing ba bka' stsal pa// // yang+ga rmyab tu phra
306a8(mdo sde): b+ha bA ta Shan ta thA go to h+ya ba da taSh+Than tsa yo ni ro d+ha/ a bem bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH// chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/ rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang // de bzhin gshegs pas
306b1(mdo sde): dka' stsal te// dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsung // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di lta ste// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos
306b2(mdo sde): kyi sku te/ sus rten cing 'dral bar 'byung ba mthong ba des// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mi dad pa can
306b3(mdo sde): gang la la zhog gis/ mi gnas pa'i phyog su mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bru tsam/ srog shing ni khab tsam/ gdugs ni ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la/ rten cing
306b4(mdo sde): 'brel par 'byung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi tshogasu pa cad po nang du bcug na/ de tshangs pa'i bsod nam ras bskyed par 'gyur te/ 'di nas shi 'phos shing 'chi
306b5(mdo sde): ba'i dus byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams
306b6(mdo sde): dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyan thos de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang
306b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i 'khor de dag lho dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 
306b8(mdo sde): 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du// Ar+ya
307a1(mdo sde): bi d+hi sad tra tsar+ya nir de shan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
307a2(mdo sde): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yangs po can na/ tshal chen po'i khang pa
307a3(mdo sde): brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang / dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan
307a4(mdo sde): bar gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byed pa/ 
307a5(mdo sde): khur bor ba/ bdag gis don rjes su thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i/ shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba// sems
307a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ spyod lam zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang / ma brtags pa dang / ldan pa sha sta la 'di lta ste/ 
307a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang zag gcig ni ma gtogs te/ da yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyamasu len par bka' stsal te/ tshe 'di nyid la lung bstan pa dang / byang
307a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' stong thams pa thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/ thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/ thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyis bzod pa dang ldan pa/ thams cad
307b1(mdo sde): kyang ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i sa thob pa/ mkhas pa drang po dad pa dang ldan pa/ rtogs pa mang ba/ dang ba/ gtso bor byed pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ khro gnyer med pa
307b2(mdo sde): g.yo med pa/ grub pa dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjesu rtogs pa/ chos bstan pas yongasu mi skyo ba/ sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag par skyes pa// yod// 
307b3(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa/ ldem po ngag la phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ yul thams cad phyin ci ma log pa'i sa dang ldan pa/ dus shes pa/ tshod shes pa/ 
307b4(mdo sde): skabs shes pa/ ran pa shes pa/ rgod pa med pa da/ khengs pa med pa/ spyod lam tha mal pa/ da phun sum tshogs pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la
307b5(mdo sde): mkhas pa 'byung ba dang / 'dzag pa yongasu spangs pa smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/ 'khru ra ba la yun ring du spyod pa la zhugs pa/ mtshan ma
307b6(mdo sde): med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/ spros pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mtshan ma lags par bzung ba/ sems can yongasu smin par bya ba la mkhas pa/ 'du shes
307b7(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa/ chos bstan pa yang dag par dbye bar 'jug par byed pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
307b8(mdo sde): ston pa nye bar zhi ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par slong ba/ spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhe 'gras pa med par chos ston pa sha stag la 'di
308a1(mdo sde): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / lag na rin chen
308a2(mdo sde): ldan dang / spos 'od dang / mtha' yas snang ba'i blo gros dang / ngan srong spong dang / don grub sems pa dang / yon tan rgyal po snang dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad sel
308a3(mdo sde): ba'i blo gros dang / mi mnyam pa thams cad ston pa dang / de'i rang bzhin du mi gnas pa dang / blo mtha' yas dang / brtson 'grus dang / rtsol brtan por sems pa dang / 
308a4(mdo sde): rin chen 'byung gnas dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang / 'khrul dpa med pa'i mthu rtsal dang / khyad par blo gros dang / kun
308a5(mdo sde): nas mdzes dang / sgrib med ston dang / rnam pa ra rtsa dang / gser mchog 'od dpal dang / chos thams cad la rtag tu lta ba'i blo ldan dang / spos dri myur
308a6(mdo sde): sbyin me tog kun tu rgyas dang / gtso bo rtsegs dang / mya ngan med pa'i dpal dang / lhun po'i lto dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po// 
308a7(mdo sde): dang temachog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang / blo mtha' yas bsgrub pa dang / dam pa'i chos thams cad mi brjod par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
308a8(mdo sde): chen po sang gi ltar sgra mngon par bsgrogs pa dang / de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po gzhan dag dang yang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan
308b1(mdo sde): 'das snga dro dus kyi che/ sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong nyis stong gis bskor cing mdun du 'dang te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer/ 
308b2(mdo sde): chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams grong khyer du gshegs pa
308b3(mdo sde): nango mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag byung te/ long ba rnams ni mthong bar gyur/ 'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/ smon
308b4(mdo sde): pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed par gyur to// lha'i me to/ dag gi char yang bab bo// snang ba chen po yang b+hu/ dang ngo // srang yang dri med par gyur to// lha'i sil snya na
308b5(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba dag kyang ma brdungs par grag go/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la thug pa nas/ 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi sems can
308b6(mdo sde): thams cad kyang cig tu nges par bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe yangs pa'i grong khyor chen po na li tsi byi seng ge'i bu rin chen byin zhes bya ba skyes nas lo gsum
308b7(mdo sde): lon pa/ ma ma'i pang ba na 'dug pa/ khang bzangs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug to/ khye'u rin chen byin gyi rmad du byung po'i mtshan ma dag
308b8(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis rang gi ma ma la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// ma ma gang gi mthu stobs kyis// shin tu ya mtshan byung ba snang // nyi ma bye ba
309a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi 'od// zil gnon snang 'di su zhig yin// stong gsum sa gzhi khyab gyur nas// ngan 'gro skams par byed pa yi// rdzu 'phrul snang ba gang yin/ 
309a2(mdo sde): 'di/ ma ma bdag la myur du smros// dus min me tog char ba yis// sangs rgyas zhing mtshams med par mdzes// phyogs rnams bya'i tshogs rnams kyis// skad snyan pas
309a3(mdo sde): ni khyab par gyur// srang yang me tog rnams kyis khebs// me tog gdugs kyang rnam par bres// skyes pa bud mad dga' rnams kyis// kun nas rab tu mdzes par 'dug/ 
309a4(mdo sde): long ba rnams kyis mig kyang thob// skye bo 'on rnam/ nas sgra yang thos// byang ngan byang gzugs phun sum tshogs// mdog ngan kha dog phun sum tshogs// 
309a5(mdo sde): g.yengs pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed// lce med tshig ni rnam par dag/ sems can byams pa'i sem sa med pa// byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur// / 
309a6(mdo sde): mA ma sems can khyad par can// rdzu 'phrul grub pa mthu ldan pa// 'jig rten dag na rgyu ba 'di// su yin bdag la kun myur smros// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyi ma mas
309a7(mdo sde): khye'u rin chen byin la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// rnam par dag pa spyod mchog ldan// rgyal ba dri med blo mi dman// bas ma yas ma lus yongasu dag/ dbang ldan yon tan
309a8(mdo sde): rin chen 'phags// 'jig rten mgon po 'khras sa mig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa lag 'di// blo ldan bsod snyoms don tu gshegs// 'jig rten chos la sten pa
309b1(mdo sde): med// 'di la sdug dang mi sdug sogs// 'jig rten pa yi rtog mi mnga'// pad+ma chu las skyes pa ltar// mnga' bdag mi gos spyod par mdzad// blo gros ldan pa the tsom
309b2(mdo sde): gcodapan mdzad thugs rjer ldan pa de// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// rnam par 'dren pa 'dir gshegaso// bstod kyang dgyes par mi 'gyur la// smad
309b3(mdo sde): kyang 'khrug par mi 'gyur te// khong khro rje su chags pa spangs// chags med rgyu ba rlung dang 'dra// 'di ni chos rgyal dam pa ste// ye shes zab mo phun sum tshogs// don dam/ 
309b4(mdo sde): don la mkhas pa po// 'gro ba'i slob dpon gshegs pa yin// da ni dbu ma ston pa ste// yod med 'dzin dalas rnam par grol// chos lam ldan zhing zhi ba ste/ 
309b5(mdo sde): rten pa thams cad yongasu spangs// ye shes phung po ba ngag med bdag/ bsod nams tshogs rnams ba sngags pa yi// bde gshegs 'jig rten 'dren pa'o// / 
309b6(mdo sde): mtha' yas gzugs can dang gshagaso// dbu skra g.ya su 'khyil par gnas// 'jam zhing mdog snum lhung lo can// gnag cing 'dzin pa med rnams kyis// de'i dbu
309b7(mdo sde): ni rnam par mdzes// gtsug tor g.yasu 'khyil pa te// dbu skra 'khyil cing leg par gnas// ri rab rtse mo 'dra bar ni// de yi dbyibs ni mdzes pa yin// de yi smin mtsham
309b8(mdo sde): mdzad spu mdzes// 'jam zhing g.yasu 'khyil pa ste// 'od ni shel dang zla ba yi// 'od zer dra ba mang bas lhag/ de yi zhal nas spyan mdzes pa// me tog u pal sngon po 'dra// 
310a1(mdo sde): ba yi rdzi ma yongasu dag/ mi dmar ma 'dzings zhi bar gzigs// dpal ldan seng ge 'gram pa 'dra// de ni rtag tu zhal yang 'dzum// sgros ni bim pa bzhin du
310a2(mdo sde): dmar tata zhal mdzes lus can kun 'dren pa// mthu stobs chen po phun sum tshogs// bsod nams brgya'i stobs mnga' ba// tshems kyi 'phreng ba spa ba'i 'od // snyoms
310a3(mdo sde): shing thags bzang yongasu dag/ de yi tshems ni shin tu dkar// ljags ni shin tu ring zhing srab// bdag nyid kyi ni zhal gyi ngos// de yis kun tu khyab par gnas// dpal
310a4(mdo sde): ldan dbu ni gdugs dang 'dra// de bzhin de ni shangs kyi dang mthe// mdog ni btso ma'i gser dang 'dra// de yi zhal gyi 'phral ba mdzes// de yi zhal gyi smin tshugs
310a5(mdo sde): ni kha dog mthon ting shin tu stug/ zhi ba'i spyan ni mdzes pa ste// snyan gyi drung du thug par gnas// snyan shal ring la rab tu 'phyang // zhal mdzes snyan
310a6(mdo sde): gyi zla bas lhag/ zhal ras pad+ma rnam dag 'dra// zhal mdangs dkar la dang zhing gsal// brtan po tshangs pa'i sgra skad ldan// de gsung ka la bing kau'i 'dra// de yi gsung
310a7(mdo sde): bzang yid du 'ong // 'jam zhing sems can tshim par byed// rma bya dang pa mi 'am ci// na tso ri skags khu byug dang // 'brug sgra khrung khrung kun la// shing shang te'u dang
310a8(mdo sde): gling bu dang // rdza rnga'i sgra dang gzhan dag kyang // sgra skad snyan pa ci yang rung // de dag de bzhin gshegs yi// gsung gi bcu drug cher mi phong // skul mdzad de bzhin ma
310b1(mdo sde): ba ste/ de ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang // yid 'ong dga' byed gsal ba ste// skyon dang bral zhing 'jigs pa med// re ba rnams la char rgyun ltar// sems rgyun tshim pa
310b2(mdo sde): byed la zhi// ma nyams ma 'khrul rab tu zhi// de bzhin dag cing brda' phrang sla// skal dang ldan zhing snyan par ldan// don dang yon tan thams cad tshogs// gsung
310b3(mdo sde): go rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs// de yi gsung ni dge skyed pa// sems can mos pa ba dad deng / de bzhin nges tshig za dang rnams// de yi gsung la nges par dang // 
310b4(mdo sde): yid kyang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// ngas ni phyogs pa cu'i 'jig rten khams// gnas pa'i sems ca na gsung gis khyad// mgon po nga yi gsung tshig
310b5(mdo sde): ni ta sems can rnams la don yod 'jug/ thub pa/ skyes mchog de yi ni// mgur yang dung 'drad/ phung 'gro zlum// de yi thal gong rgyas pa ste// da na
310b6(mdo sde): bdun po mtho ba mnga'// de'i phyag kyang rab tu ring // lpags pa gser mchog 'dra ba ste// gser gyi sdong po bzhin du mtho// n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab// thugs ka dpal
310b7(mdo sde): gyi bai'us brgyan te// 'khor lo'i mtshan cani pad+ma'i phyag/ shing bal mdab ltar reg na 'jam// de yi phyag gi sor mo ring // spu rnams re rer skye zhing yar phyogs
310b8(mdo sde): stag la 'jam// brang gi phal ka tsha la rgyas sta zib// phyal dbyibs gzhu 'dra glang chen bzhin du sbub su nub// rje ngar e na ya 'dre mdangs kar 'dom bu'i sbubs// 
311a1(mdo sde): long bu mi mngon de yi rting pa legs par grub// de bzhin drang srong sor mo ring zhing sen mo dmar// bde bar gshegs kyi zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon to// 
311a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo lcags kyu bkra shis ldan dang dung gis spras// mgon po de yi zhabs gnyis mnyam zhing lags gnas dang // shing bal bzhin du reg na 'jam zhing bzang
311a3(mdo sde): ba dang me tog ud pal dmar paM lags par skyes pa yi// kha dog 'dra bas sa gzhi dag la gshegs par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa seng ga'i sgra sgrogs bde
311a4(mdo sde): sbyin pa// 'gro ba rnams kyi gtso bo da ni 'dir gshigs te// yong gis 'jigs pa med par seng ge 'i sgra skad kyis// gnyisu med cing spros pa med pa'i
311a5(mdo sde): chos kyang ston// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis bdag gi ma ma la 'di skad ces smraso// ma ma bdag skar khung 'dir zhog shig dang // de bzhin
311a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dalta'o// de nas ma ma des khye'u rin chen byin skar khung du bzhag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rin chen byin gyi sems kyi yongasu rtogs pa
311a7(mdo sde): thugs kyis mkhyen nas// srang de kho nar gsheg so// khye'u rin chen byin gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems
311a8(mdo sde): tegang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa 'di lta bu mthong na/ byang chub kyi sems skyed par mi byed pa de dag ni rnyed pa nyes par rnyeng pa'i snyamo// 
311b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin gyi sgo'i drung du gshegs so// de nas khye'u rin chen byin 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can khyad par can 'di lta bu ni bskal
311b2(mdo sde): pa bya ba phrag 'bum du yang rnyed par dkas// khang bzangs 'di las bdag gi mchong bar bya'o snya mo// de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis gser las byas pa'i pad ma
311b3(mdo sde): 'dob ma 'bum dang ldan pa brtsan pa lag mthil du khyer ro// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis khang bzangs de las bdag nyid kyis mchongaso// da sangs rgyas kyi mthus
311b4(mdo sde): nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug go/ de nas khye'u rin che dan byin gyis ril gyi gsor las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma 'bum dang ldan pa da bcom ldan 'das la
311b5(mdo sde): phul lo// de khye'u rin chen byin gyi lag nas btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang zangad gyi na mkha' bar snang la/ pad+ma'i gdug suM byas te rin
311b6(mdo sde): po che'i dra ba yang bras so// de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// sangs rgyas pad+ma 'di phul ba// bdag ni ci yang mi 'tshal te/ don
311b7(mdo sde): rnams thams cad bcang slad du// bdag ni byang chub mchog 'tshalo// ji ltar byang chub ma skyes la// thob pa ma mchis gshig ma mchis// blang du ma mchis
311b8(mdo sde): dor ma mchis// da ltar bdag gis me tog 'bul// byis pa rnams kyi don gang brtags// brtogs pa da ni don ma mchis// rtog pa thams cad bcad slad du// 
312a1(mdo sde): gang zag mchog la bdag mchod bgyid/ de phyir me tog phel ba 'ang // bdag la rnam smin 'bras ma gyur// dngos po thams cad gcad slad du/ 
312a2(mdo sde): pad+ma 'di ni bdag gis phul// bdag gis sangs rgyas zhing du ni/ rgyal mchog theg pas 'gro ma gtogs// nyan thos kyi ni ming yang rung // rang rgyal ming yang 'byung
312a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// khyod ni ston pa 'di 'dra la/ dad pas mchod pa byed mod kyis// 
312a4(mdo sde): blo gros phyin ci log gyur na// sangs rgya su ni ji ltar la/ gyur// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshe dang lnga na pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la tshigasu bcad de
312a5(mdo sde): smras po// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes te// 'dus byas dag ni gsob dang gsog/ de 'dra ba yi chos rnams la// dngos por 'gyur ba ga la yod// 
312a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis chos gos ngur smrig bgos// dgra bcom nyid du 'dzin par byed// rnam shas 'di dang spyod yul yang / stong pa kho na ma yin nam// dmigs pa la ni gnas
312a7(mdo sde): bcas pas// sangs rgyas bya ba ma mnyes byas// bye ba de yang zhi bar mthong // su yang ma mnyes byos pa med// mo'u dgal bu la da dung yang // dmigs pa 'jug pa
312a8(mdo sde): yod dam ci// khyod kyi sems ni gang zhig gis// yon yang yongasu sbyong bar byed// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces
312b1(mdo sde): smraso// khye'u ci de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas sam/ chos kyang ma bstan tam// khye'u
312b2(mdo sde): rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu mkhas pas ni byang chub spros par mi bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa yang rlom semasu mi bya'o// chos mi skye'o snyam du
312b3(mdo sde): skrag par mi bya'o// chos thams cad 'dus byas so snyam du skrag par mi bya'o// chos thams cad 'dus ma byaso// snyam du skyug par mi byo'o de bzhin du sbyar te/ chos
312b4(mdo sde): thams cad skyo ba dang / mi skye ba dang / dngos po dang / dadangos po meng pa zhes bya ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / gtong ba zhes bya ba dang / phrad pa dang bral ba zhes bya
312b5(mdo sde): ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang / gnas pa dang / pho ba dang / 'dod chags kyi chos dang / zhe sda/ nga gi chos dang / gti mug gi chos dang / chos dang // 
312b6(mdo sde): chos ma yin pa zhes brtag par mi bya'o// ma rig pa la sogs pa nas/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
312b7(mdo sde): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can
312b8(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du shes med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / spyod pa yongasu dag pa dang / mnyam pa nyid dang / mi mnyam
313a1(mdo sde): ba nyid dang / lus dang / sems dang / chos thams cad tshul bzhin dang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes skrag par mi/ 
313a2(mdo sde): bya'o/ mo'u dgal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshong rgya 'am/ smras pa/ de ni ma
313a3(mdo sde): yin no// smras pa/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang / byang chub de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang / so so'i skye bo de bzhin nyid lam gtog/ 
313a4(mdo sde): par 'dod dam// mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ da ni ma yin no// khye'us smras pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod spros pa med pa la spros par byed dam/ mo'u
313a5(mdo sde): dgal gyi bus smras pa/ kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi kun/ rdzob kyi sgo nas ston to// khye'us smras pa/ mo/ 'u dgal gyi bu 'jig rten ni brdzun pa slu ba sgyu ma'i
313a6(mdo sde): rnam pa byis pa 'dod par byed pa'o// mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ gal te 'jig rten 'di brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can yin na/ bstan pa 'di yang brdzun pa slu ba'i
313a7(mdo sde): chos can/ khyod ci'i phyir ston par byed/ smras pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu chos thams cad ni bstan du meng po ste/ de dag ni bstan par bya ba ma yin/ thob par bya ba ma
313a8(mdo sde): yin temangon sum du bya ba ma yin// spang bar bya ba ma yin/ yongasu shes par bya ba ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba ma yin no// mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ 
313b1(mdo sde): 'o na khyod kyis gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ khye'us smras pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sbyin pa po 'am/ sbyin par dmigs
313b2(mdo sde): samade nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu bdag gis de las bsams nas/ de bzhin
313b3(mdo sde): gshegs par 'gyur ba yongasu spangs te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems bskyed par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni/ rnyed pa nyes par rnyed pa'o zhes de skad kyi tshig smras
313b4(mdo sde): so/ ta mo'u dgal gyi bus smras pa/ khyod ni na tshod shin tu gzhon// shes rab kyis ni rgya mtsho bar bzhin// khyod kyis ji srid tsam zhig nas// chos 'di dag
313b5(mdo sde): la bslabs par gyur// khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa// bslab pa thams cad rnam 'jigs pa/ bslab pa gang yin de bslab min// gang la
313b6(mdo sde): bslab pa med pa da// mkhas pa rnams kyi bslab pa yin// don gang khyod kyis bdag dris la// sems can 'du shes gnas pa ste/ 'dir ni chos rnams thams cad
313b7(mdo sde): la/ gang la'ang skye ba mi rnyed do// byis pa rnams ni byang chub dang // 'khor ba nyid du rtogs par byed// 'dir ni da dung btsun pa khyod// byis pa'i chos la 'brang ngam ci// 
313b8(mdo sde): ring po 'am yang na thung ngu zhes// mkhas pa dag ni rtog mi byed// chos kun snying po med par ni// de bzhin de dag khong du chud// byis pa 'am byis pa'i chos rnams sam/ 
314a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas chos sam rgyal ba'ang rung // blo ldan tha dad mi 'byed kyis// stong pa nyid la de ltar ltos// drang srong chen pos byang chub thob// de ni mi rigs
314a2(mdo sde): brtags pa yin// chos 'di la ni skye med na/ mya ngan 'das pa ji ltar 'thob// chos rnams mtha' yas rab tu gsungs// sems can grol ba'ang dngos po med// ma ngan
314a3(mdo sde): 'das dang 'khor ba la// tha dad dbyer med gzung bar gyis// 'di la rnam pa thams cad du// bsnun dang dbri ba ci yang med// tha dad med pa'i chos rnams la/ mkhas pa
314a4(mdo sde): rnams ni rmongs mi 'gyur// byis pa rnams kyis thob cing rnyed// byis pas mya ngan 'das pa thob// 'kho/ dar ba la ni de kun chags// rlom sems bdud kyi 'chang
314a5(mdo sde): ba yin// gang gis blo la ngas thob snyam// des ni ci yang thob pa mang // ngo yi yang srid 'go ba yi// ma rig pa la'ang 'jug par 'gyur// byang chub
314a6(mdo sde): snying por 'dug nas ni// mthong ba med cing spangs pa'ang med// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub 'di // tha snyad yin te don du min// byang chub dang ni mya ngan 'das// tha snyad
314a7(mdo sde): dag gis brjod mi nus// gang dag da ltar yang dag mthong // de dag chos nyid rnam par shes// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces
314a8(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin gyis// yun ji srid gcig nas chos 'di la spyad lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe
314b1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ 'di mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la stong pa nyid la
314b2(mdo sde): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to// gang gi tshe ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa de'i tshe/ 'dis
314b3(mdo sde): bzod pa thob nas bskal pa sum 'bum lon no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin// bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
314b4(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i rgyu ni gang lags// rkyen ni gang legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis khye'u
314b5(mdo sde): rin chen byin 'di nyid la dris shig dang / 'di nyid khyod la ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan bai shA ri'i bus// khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad
314b6(mdo sde): ces smraso// ci'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/ rin chen byin gyis smras pa// bla na med pa yang
314b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub ma dmigs pas na/ de'i phyir bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'o na cing bzhin gshegs pa 'di
314b8(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa las na dmigs pa la spyod dam// rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par
315a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas par 'dzin na ni/ de dmigs par 'gyur ba zhig na/ chos gsung ba ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par yang mi mdzad la/ spong bar
315a2(mdo sde): yang mi mdzad do// shA ri'i bus smras pa// khyod chos bzhi sgrub pa dang / yongasu smin pa mnyam pas/ bzod pa gang la gnas// khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ bdag
315a3(mdo sde): gis ni chos gcig kyang yongasu grub par yang dag par ma mthong na/ bzhi lta ci smos// 'di la yang dag par 'grub pa gang zhig yod de/ chos rnam par rig pa zhes bya
315a4(mdo sde): ba 'di ni dmigs pa'o// byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni dmigs pa'o// nga bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya rab 'di ni 'dzin pa'o// grol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni spros
315a5(mdo sde): pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'di/ lta bu'i chos rnams la spyod la/ rdzus te skye bo/ sa sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du gyur par skye
315a6(mdo sde): zhing / rtag tu rab tu byung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to// de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// skye dang de bzhin skye mang gnyis ni spros pa
315a7(mdo sde): stekun tu rtog pa'i sa dang bdud kyi spyod yul yin// lus la sogs pa'i chos 'dzin rlom sems 'dod pa yi// lha dang lha min 'gro po rnams ni 'dir brlago/ 
315a8(mdo sde): rgyal bas bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas pa brnyas snyam du// de ltar gang dag bsam pa rab tu 'jug byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas la ni sku ngas gsol bar byed// brnyes
315b1(mdo sde): kyang 'di la 'dren pa rnams kyis brnyed pa med// 'dir ni skye bo mang po dag/ rab tu byung nas rang byung rlom// sems kyi dmigs pas rnam khrul nas// bstan pa la ni sun
315b2(mdo sde): 'byin rnams// bdud rtsi bdag gis thob bo zhes// thob bo'i nga rgyal can dag smra// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yi// bstan pa la ni spros pa med// sems kyi rnam pa thams
315b3(mdo sde): cad du// sems kyi ngo bo nyid mi rtogs// de bzhin rnam 'dren gsungs pa yi// lta ba de ni rang bzhin med// spyan dag rgyal bas gsungs pa yi// lta ba la ni lta ba med// 
315b4(mdo sde): de phyir shes rab ldan pa ni// bdag nyid grol snyam 'dzin pa med// mtshan mar 'dzin pa sgom pa rnam das// bdag tu dmigs pas rmongs par gyur// mkhan
315b5(mdo sde): pa ma yin kha cig ni// yang dag ma yin stong pa spong // dngos po rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// rang gi sla sa ni brtags nas kyang // mi mkhas de dag dngos po
315b6(mdo sde): rnams// gzhig phyir mya ngan 'das pa smra// lus la yang ni rten bcas nas// tshul khrims 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ sems kyi dmigs pa dag la yang // bsan
315b7(mdo sde): gtan 'du shes rnam par 'jig/ de bzhin shes rab dmigs nas kyang // sa bon 'du shes rnam par rmongs// 'jig rten 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis// de dag
315b8(mdo sde): chos kyi rkun por brjod// 'di 'dra ba'i chos rnams la// chos rnams 'od gsal nyon mongs med// 'o na rab tu byung ba'i don// khyod kyis bdag la ji skad brjod// 
316a1(mdo sde): chos rnams thams cad tha dad med// 'di dag brag cha 'dra ba yin// mkhas pa de dag nam du yang // 'phags pa'i spyod yul rtog mi byed// gzhan
316a2(mdo sde): min mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid// gzhan dag tu ni yong mi 'gyur// chos rnams 'gyur ba med pa la// rab 'byung brtags pas ci zhig bya// de nas 'jam dpal gzhan
316a3(mdo sde): nur gyur pas// khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smraso// khye'u byang chub ces bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas yin rin chen byin gyis smras pa// 'jam dpal byang chub
316a4(mdo sde): ni tshig gi bla dgas med pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smra sa pa/ khyod ci las bsams te 'di skad smra/ darin chen byin gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos nyid
316a5(mdo sde): ni bsam du med pa yin na/ de bdag gis ji skad bsams te bstan par bya// 'jam dpal rgya sa smras pa// 'di la la sa dang po pa'i byang chub
316a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' la ji ltar gdams ngag bstan par bya// ji ltar rdzasu bstan par bya// rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ 'di skad ces smras par bya te/ 'dod tshogs ma
316a7(mdo sde): spangs shig/ zhe sdang ma gzhil cig/ gti mugo ma basprul cig/ rang gi lus las gyen du mi skyod cig/ mi dag pa spyod cig/ lta ba tshar ma gcad cig/ kun tu/ 
316a8(mdo sde): sbyor ba rnams ma bton cig/ phung po rnams yongasu zung shig/ khams rnams ril por gyis shig/ skye mched rnams la spyod cig/ byis pa'i sa las 'da'
316b1(mdo sde): bar ma byed cig/ mi dge ba la rtogs shig/ dge ba spongs shig/ sangs rgyas yid la ma byed cig/ chos ma sems shig/ dge 'dun la mchod pa ma byed cig/ 
316b2(mdo sde): bslab pa yang dag par ma len cig/ srid pa nye bar zhi ba don du ma gnyer cig/ chu bo las ma rgal cig ces gdams ngag 'di lta bu 'dis/ las dang po pa'i byang
316b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la gdams par bya'o// rjesu bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa 'di ni/ gnas pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro// 
316b4(mdo sde): byis pa de dag ni skye ba'i chos su lung bston par byed do// 'grag pa'o chos su lung ston par bye'o// chos kyi dbyings 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pas rab
316b5(mdo sde): tu phye ba yin te/ chos 'di rnams kyi rang bzhi na da ltar rje su rtog pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub bo zhes de ltar gdams na/ gal te mi skrag
316b6(mdo sde): mi dang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i skal ba can yin no snyam du shes par bya ste/ 
316b7(mdo sde): gdams ngag 'dis yang dang yang du yang dag par dga' ba skyed par bya'o// de'i tshe dmigs po can gyi dge slong brgyad kyis/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bsten par
316b8(mdo sde): spangs nas/ 'khor de nas song ste/ kha nas khrag dran po byung nas sho'o// shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du skyeso// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
317a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas gnod pa chen
317a2(mdo sde): po ji tsam du gyur pa la gzigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de skad ma zar cig/ gal te dge slong 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam
317a3(mdo sde): grangs 'di mi thos su zin na/ bskal pa sa ye'i bar du nams kyang bzang 'gror skye bar yang mi 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas dang phrad cing mnyes par byed pa lta ci smos/ 
317a4(mdo sde): da ni de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang / bcas pas thos nas/ de bzod kho nar sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod nas shi 'phos te/ dga'
317a5(mdo sde): ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes// de dag bskal pa drug cu brgyad kyi bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa khra ga khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ 
317a6(mdo sde): thams cad du rdzus te skye zhing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sha stag du 'gyur la/ bskal pa cig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i// 
317a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bdag cag lung bstan pa/ lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos nas/ de dag lnga'i
317a8(mdo sde): bu brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dang ste lhags nas/ lha'i me tog gis yangs pa'i grong khyer thams cad du gtor to// chos kyi rnam
317b1(mdo sde): grangs 'di la yang rje su yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rje su yi rang lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi tshul 'phel bar mdzad du gsol zhes
317b2(mdo sde): kyang gsol to// de dag rje su yi rang ba'i mod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po'i srog
317b3(mdo sde): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// srog chags khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos
317b4(mdo sde): kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag dgo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam da dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam
317b5(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du thabs la mkhas pa med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa bas/ gang gis chos
317b6(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pa thos na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na/ gang gis som nyi med par thos pa lta ci smos/ gang yi gar 'dri ba
317b7(mdo sde): dang lung nod pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos// 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod
317b8(mdo sde): pas kyang / chos 'di la brlab par bya'o// rang byang chub thob par 'dod pas kyang chos 'di la bslab par bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
318a1(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang // chos 'di la brlab par bya'o// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis rang gi ma ma la 'di skad ces smra so// ma ma
318a2(mdo sde): kho bo la kha zas byin cig dang / bcom ldan 'das la zhal zas 'bul bar bya'o// ngo nas khye'u rin tshon byin gyi ma mas khar ba'i snod zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bkang
318a3(mdo sde): ste khye'u rin chen byin la byin no// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi zad pa'i
318a4(mdo sde): bden pa gang lags pa'i bden pa des na dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad tshim par ma gyur gyi bar du/ khar ba'i snod 'di yongasu 'grib par ma gyur
318a5(mdo sde): cig de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed dkang nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun la smras pa/ btsun pa rnams bdag la thugs
318a6(mdo sde): brtse ba'i slad du/ gang gis bdag la 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba'i bsod nams 'di bzhes te/ gang lus kyis yon sbyong bar mi byed pa dang / sems kyis sbyong bar
318a7(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / gang la phul na bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba dang / rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las
318a8(mdo sde): dang mi ldan pa dang / gang 'dus byas la mi gnas pa dang / gang 'dus ma byas la mi gnas pa dang / gang so so'i chos rnams kyis ma gos pa dang / nyan thos kyi
318b1(mdo sde): chos rnams la mi rten pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges par mi 'byung ba dang / nges par 'byung bar mi 'dod pa des bzhes shig/ de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de
318b2(mdo sde): ngag gi nang nas sus kyang / snod de ma blangaso// khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa dge bdag kya sbyin par 'dod pa lags/ khyed kyang gsol bar bzhed pa
318b3(mdo sde): lags te// bdag btsun pa rnams las ci yang ra ba ma mchis kyis bzhis shig/ 'jam dpal gyi tshad dang / mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bya ba phrag 'bum
318b4(mdo sde): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa da bas kya dang ches bya ba phrag 'bum las lhag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod po/ bdag gi sangs
318b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing du 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshe/ ga gang yin pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig da sa na/ khar ba'i snong 'di las khyed thams cad kyi/ 
318b6(mdo sde): lhung bzed rnams gang bar gyur cig/ khar ba'i snod 'di yang yongasu zad par ma gyur cig ces byaso// de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed de dag
318b7(mdo sde): gong bar gyur to// de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed yod pa thams cad kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa des tshim par byas// 
318b8(mdo sde): bsod snyoms de yang zad par ma gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rin chen byin lnga po 'di dag ni/ 
319a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i yon yongasu sbyong ba ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus mi dmigs pa dang / sems mi dmigs pa dang / sbyin pa la mngon par
319a2(mdo sde): zhen pa med pa dang / rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / len pa po rnams la rnam par smin pa med pa'o// rin chen byin bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu/ 
319a3(mdo sde): mngon du bya ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe ni/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / bdag gi las kyi rnam par smin
319a4(mdo sde): ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// 'jam dpal khye'u rin chen byin 'di bkal pa
319a5(mdo sde): sum cu na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ra 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
319a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ljon pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga
319a7(mdo sde): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang / grags pa don yod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de'i 'khor du 'dus pa yang
319a8(mdo sde): mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ de dag kyang 'od mtha' yas pa dang / tsha dpag tu meng par 'gyur ro// / 
319b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'i ming tsa lags/ 'di ji ltar gzu
319b2(mdo sde): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ chos nyid kyis skye bo nas bya bar yang zung
319b3(mdo sde): shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas gshegaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal
319b4(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen byin dang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
319b5(mdo sde): yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung sa pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba
319b6(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / brang nya bor mA dang / zhu chen gyi l-i tsA ba bin d+ha ye shes sde
319b7(mdo sde): la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya ger skad du/ Ar+ya tsan t+ya pra b+hA sa ni ra nga sho nA ma d+harma par+yA ya/ 
319b8(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 
320a1(mdo sde): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ 
320a2(mdo sde): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam dang / thobs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
320a3(mdo sde): mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por gnas nas bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / blon po chen po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong rdal gyi mi dang / nang mi rnams
320a4(mdo sde): kyis sti stang du byas/ btsun par byas/ ri mo byas/ mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bza da' ba dang / bca' ba dang / phyog pa dang / mang ba bzad
320a5(mdo sde): po mang po brnyas so// 'di ltar bcomo ldan 'das da ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/ 
320a6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rigs
320a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa/ gdung phun sum tshogs pa/ cho rigs phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa/ shes rab
320a8(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa'i
320b1(mdo sde): sgra dang / snyan pa 'jig rten du rgya cher mngon tu byung bar gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ 
320b2(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge babar du dge ba/ tha mor dag pa/ don bzang
320b3(mdo sde): boHtshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to// spyan lnga dang yang ldan te/ sha'i spyan dang / 
320b4(mdo sde): lha'i spyan dang / chos kyi spyan dang / shes rab kyi sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa
320b5(mdo sde): dang / kun tu rgyu dang / gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu rnams ni tsher bcad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa ni lha dang mi rnams kyis yang dag par bzung zhing
320b6(mdo sde): 'bar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang / sham thabs mnabs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ dge slong gi tshogs dge slong gi dge
320b7(mdo sde): 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing / mdun du bdar to// mdun du gzigs pa dang / g.yas g.yosu gzigs pa
320b8(mdo sde): mdzes pa dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba mdzes pa dang / chos gos snam sbyar dang / bsil zan dang / na bza tshigs dang / lhung bzed bsnams pa mdzes pa dang / 
321a1(mdo sde): sku mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang / 'od 'dom gang bas mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gi nang na me'i phung po lta bu dang / tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ba lta bu dang / 
321a2(mdo sde): nyi ma shar ba lta buro phyogasu snang zhing / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te/ grong khyer chen po mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs
321a3(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo'i them po la zhabs bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por grong khyer du gshegs pa na/ cho 'phrul ngo mtshar rmad/ 
321a4(mdo sde): du byung ba'i chos rnam pa 'di lta bu dag byung ste/ skye/ sa bu dam pa 'dren pa de gshegs pa de'i tshe/ der cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po gang dag brjod pa
321a5(mdo sde): byas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis nyon cig/ long ba rnams kyis ni mthong ngo // 'on pa rnams kyi sa ni thos so// gtsor bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed do// 
321a6(mdo sde): smon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa thob bo// grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad thal mo sbyar te bde bar gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / 
321a7(mdo sde): sgro snyan dag ni ma brdungs par sgra byung ngo // ngad pa dang / ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / na tse dang / khyo byug dag kyang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to// gang dag
321a8(mdo sde): gtar stor ba de dag gis ni gter rnams brnyed par 'gyur ro// gsar dang dngul las byas pa'i snod rnams kyang ma bkrol bar yang sgra byung ngo // sa yang rnam pa
321b1(mdo sde): drug du g.yos shing 'gul te/ sems can rnams bskyabs med par yang ma gyur cing / yid dang ba rab tu thob bo// smra ba'i mchog dam pa sangs rgyas kyi gang dang
321b2(mdo sde): gang du zhabs kyi gom pa bor ba de dang der pad+ma dri ma med cing legs par gnas pa rnams byung ngo // dud 'gro'i skye gnas song ba'i sems can gang dag gis mthong
321b3(mdo sde): ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba rnyed nas/ mthe ri su skye bar 'gyuraro// bud med gang dag sbrum pa de dag kyang mi bde ba med pa nyid du gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa
321b4(mdo sde): drag kyang btsaso// sems can rnams la yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis gnod par gyur pa med do// rab tu sdang ba'i sems
321b5(mdo sde): med par phan tshun du smra ste/ dper na pa 'am ma zhi ga pu cig pa la sme ba bzhin no// srang gi ga yon rnams kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to// 
321b6(mdo sde): nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang / me tog sil ma dag mngon par gtor te/ sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa gang yang med do// / 
321b7(mdo sde): sems can gang dag na bar gyur pa de dag kyang nad med par gyur te/ bde ba thob bo// bde bar gshegs pa ni sems can so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa ci bdag
321b8(mdo sde): kho na la gzigaso snyam du semaso// so so nas bdag nyid bsod snyoms 'bul zhing mi'i 'dren pa la brtertan nas/ bdag kho na bsod snyoms kyi 'bras bu la sbyor ro// 
322a1(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ de'i gshegs pa tsam yang gzhal ba ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po mnyan yod du mthar chagasu bsod snyom
322a2(mdo sde): bzhes shing gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das grong bar gyi dbus zhig tu gshegs pa dang / de'i tshe khang stong zhig na khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ lta na sdug pa
322a3(mdo sde): zhig bor bar gyur te/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo khar bcug nas 'jib cing 'dug la/ khyi 'am ce spyang gang dag khang stong der lhags pa de dag kyang khye'u de lci'i dngangapa
322a4(mdo sde): pos bldags shing 'dong ste/ 'di ltar ston byas pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa bas khye'u de la 'tshe ba mi byed do// khang stong der skye bo phal po che dag kyang 'jug cing 'bru
322a5(mdo sde): ngo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che 'jug cing 'byung ba gzigs nas/ mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
322a6(mdo sde): dga' po gang du skye bo phal po che dag 'jug cing 'byung ba'i khang stong du na ci yod ltos// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das
322a7(mdo sde): kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / khang stong ga la ba dar song nas phyin pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ lta na sdug pa lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzum mo khar cug sa/ 
322a8(mdo sde): 'jib cing 'dug la mig gnyis mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshogs thams cad lta ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
322b1(mdo sde): song ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skabs de gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khang pa stong pa de na/ khye'u bor ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa/ 
322b2(mdo sde): rin po che'i gzugs ltar mchis pa mig gnyis mi 'dzums par skye bo'i tshigs thams cad lta ba zhig mchiso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kye ma khye'u 'di ni sngon
322b3(mdo sde): gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ste/ nga'i legs par bshed pa'i don shes par nus shing skal ba can no snyam nas/ khye'u la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dge ba
322b4(mdo sde): la gzud pa'i phyir/ khang stong ga la ba dang gsheg/ so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dar gshegs na das phyogs gcig tu bzhugs te/ phyogs gcig
322b5(mdo sde): tu bzhugs nas/ khye'u de la tshigasu bcad de bka/ 'a stsal pa/ sbrul dang gnod sbyin rgyu ba yi// dur khrod 'jigs pa che 'di na// byis pa ji ltar mi
322b6(mdo sde): 'jigs shing // khyod da gcig pu 'di na 'dug/ de nas khye'u das/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsabs/ bcom ldan 'das la slar tshigasu bcad
322b7(mdo sde): de gsol pa// bdag ma mchis pa'i tshogs rnams la// thub pa'i dbang phyug su zhig 'dzegs// thams cad mkhyen pa smra ba'i mchog/ ji ltar 'dir mchis las
322b8(mdo sde): gang lags// bdag cig bdag gi gang ma mchis// bdag kyang gang ga'ing ma lags te// bdag gi su lags de ma mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
323a1(mdo sde): pa pa sngon chad sdig pa byas pa'i las// de'i rnam smin 'di 'dra ste// khang pa stong pa 'dir bor nas// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong ba yin// khye'u gsol
323a2(mdo sde): pa go'u tam khang stong snyam pa yo// 'du shes da dung mngal ba lta// byang chub snying por khyod bzhugs nas// 'du shes yongasu ma mkhyen ta mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
323a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa// ngas ni 'du shes yongs shes te// nga la 'du shes yod ma yin// khyod nyid la ni snying brtsebs/ khang pa stong pa 'dir 'ong so// khye'us gsol pa/ sems// 
323a4(mdo sde): can dag ni bar 'ga' yang / gang tshe shin tu mi dmig das pa// de tshe thugs rjes gang du 'byung // khyod ni su la thugs brtse mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis
323a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa// bdag meng zhi ba stong pa nyid/ sem sa can 'di dag mi shes te// de dag nyid la sna nga rje'i phyir// bsod snyoms spyad pa spyod pa yin// 
323a6(mdo sde): khye'us gsol pa// stong pa zhi bar thugs chud nas// zhi ba stong pa nyid mkhyen na// de bzhin gshegs pa da dung du// byin ci log kyang ma spangs sam// bcom ldan
323a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// zhi ba stong pa nyid rtogs nas// sems can yongasu smin bya'i phyir// 'dren pa chos ston mdzad pa 'di// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rjes/ 
323a8(mdo sde): yin// khye'us gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dadung du// khyod kyi phyin ci log me spangs// sems can 'du shes ma mchis na// thugs rje gang du skye bar 'gyur// 
323b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni rab bzung nas// yod min sems can rnams la yang // mi mchog rnams ni go gyon pa// rang byung rnams
323b2(mdo sde): kyi byin rlabaso// khye'us gsol pa// dngos po gang na'ang mi dmigs pas// go cha thams cad brdzun pa lags// dngos po ma mchis chos rnams la// go cha dmigs
323b3(mdo sde): pa mo mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos rnams dngos po yod min yang // srog chags rnams la chos ston 'di// 'jig rten mgon po skyob
323b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi// thugs rjes rnam par rol pa yin// khye'us gsol pa/ chos ni yi ger ma mchi// sa na// bshad pa gud na ga la mchis// 'jig rten
323b5(mdo sde): rnams la slu mdzad dam/ chos ma lags pa ches pa shod dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa// nga ni 'dzag rten sku ma yin// chos ma yin/ 
323b6(mdo sde): ba'ang nga mi skye// phyin ci ldog gyur sems can gyi/ nyon mongs sel bar da byed do// khye'us gsol pa// nyon mongs rtsa ba ma mchis te// nang dam phyir rol rnams
323b7(mdo sde): na yang // de dag rnams kyi gnas ma mchis// nyon mongs ji ltar rnam par sbyang // bcom ldan 'ad bka' stsal pa// phyin ci log las byung ba rnams// yongasu brtags
323b8(mdo sde): las skyes pa ste// rtog pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir// srogs chags rnams la chos ston to// khye'us gsol pa/ rnam brtag mang pi tsa 'tshal te/ sems ni rang / 
324a1(mdo sde): bzhin 'od gsal zhing / de la nyon mongs mi 'byung ste// nams kyang nyon mongs de mi 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de
324a2(mdo sde): bzhin te// sems ni rtag tu 'od gsal kyang // blo bur nye ba'i nyon mongs kyis// so so'i skye bo nyon mongs 'gyur// khye'us gsol pa// nyon mongs dmigasu ma mchis/ 
324a3(mdo sde): te/  dag phyogs na mi gnas nas// blo bur du ni ji ltar 'gyur// de zhus bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dper na sprin rnams
324a4(mdo sde): bar snang la// snang yang de dag de bzhin min// nyin mo/ dngas 'byung ba'ang de 'dra ste// snang yang de dag de ba/ bzhin min// khye'us gsol pa/ ma nor de bzhin
324a5(mdo sde): gang legs pa// chos gnas nyid de chos nyid do// ma nor de bzhin nyid chos la// nir ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
324a6(mdo sde): pa/ byis pa 'du shes ldan rnams kyi// log par rnam par gang brtags pa// blo nga rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs rnams 'byung ba yin// khya'us
324a7(mdo sde): gsol pa/ skye ma mchis pas rab phye ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhig 'byung / skye ba ma mtshos chos rnams la// sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'thang ma lags// bcom
324a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// skye ba med par skye ba ni// sangs rgyas 'byung bar rab tu bstan// kun rdzob tha snyad btags pa ste// dam pa'i don du yong ma yin// 
324b1(mdo sde): khye'us gsol pa/ da dung khyod la don dam dang // kun rdzob 'du shes gnyis mnga' ste// theg pa gcig lam 'gal 'gyur ba/ go'u tam khyod kyis bka' stsal to// 
324b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nga ni lam dang 'gal mi byed// 'gal ba med pa rang gnas te// mi 'thun sems can sdums kyang byed// khye'u khyod de ltar/ 
324b3(mdo sde): shes par gyis// khye'us gsol pa/ sems can de ni mi dmigs na// go'u tam khyod ni ci sdums mdzad// chos rnams sngon gyi mtha' la gzigs// gang gi
324b4(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs skye// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mtha' dang / de bzhin da ltar byung ba dang // byang chub dam pa
324b5(mdo sde): rtogs gyur nas/ srog chags rnams la chos sto na to// khye'us gsol pa/ rdzogs sangs rgya sa shes sgrogs mdzad cing // nyid kyi mkhyen pa
324b6(mdo sde): sgrogs mdzad de// 'di ltar bdag du sgro 'dogs pas// khyod ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal che// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga ni bdag la mi stong ngo de// 
324b7(mdo sde): bzhon gzhan la brnyas ma byed// de bzhin nyid ni rab tu ston// des ni de bzhin gshegs shes bya// khye'us gsol pa/ brjod du ma mchis de bzhin nyid// de na
324b8(mdo sde): de nyid ma mchis na/ sgra skad ma mchis sgras bshad pa// mkhyen bzhin log par bka' ma stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos de thams cad
325a1(mdo sde): log pa ste/ de bzhin nyid las byung ba yin// de bzhin nyid ni rtogs pas na// nga la skyon med yon tan med// khye'us gsol pa// de bzhin gshegs/ 
325a2(mdo sde): pa'i mthu yin na/ bdag gis spobs pa 'di skyes te/ 'di 'dra'i lan dag gang gsol pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bzod par gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
325a3(mdo sde): phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can chos kyi nang nas phyung ste// khye'u de logasu brkyang pa dang / de nas khye'u nges bcom ldan 'das kyi phag gi sor mo la bzung ste langs
325a4(mdo sde): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de khang stong nas bsgrubs te/ srang du bzhag pa dang / dang na skye bo phal po tsho dag 'di ltar khye'u 'ang / 'di la
325a5(mdo sde): na ltar nyon mongs par gyur kyang // bdag nyid chen de'i chos 'di lta bu'i lan 'debs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ngo mtshar to snyam
325a6(mdo sde): nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la rab tu phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khye'u khyod kyi las
325a7(mdo sde): sgrib pa zad kyis/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par gyis li/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po la yang shes par gyis te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston cig/ de nas
325a8(mdo sde): khye'u des las mi bdun srid tsam du 'phags nas/ lus las 'od phyung ste/ 'od des mnyan yod thams cad dang / 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang ba chen pos
325b1(mdo sde): rgyas par gyur to// 'od das brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa lnga brgyad stong mang po gzhan dag la yang / yang dag par bskul bar
325b2(mdo sde): gyur nas/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dar song ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lha'i
325b3(mdo sde): me tog dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi
325b4(mdo sde): zhing 'di 'od kyis snang bar bgyis nas/ sems/ can dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyiso// zhes chad du brjod pa de skad ched du brjod de/ da ltar
325b5(mdo sde): khye'u de'i ming snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ sna ngab bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar btag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / khye'u 'di bsam/ 
325b6(mdo sde): gyi mi khyab pa zhes bya bar gyur cig ces/ khye'u 'di ming la NA su yi rangs pa mdzad do// de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bar snang de las babs te/ 
325b7(mdo sde): sa la 'dug pa dang / de sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / rang gi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas 'di lta ste dper na/ rogs pa lo brgyad lon pa'i lus gzugs yongasu grub par
325b8(mdo sde): gyur pa de 'dra bar 'dug go// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khye'u de la lha'i ras bcos bu zung cig byin te/ kye khye'u nga la snying brtsa ba'i phyir/ ras bcos dzu
326a1(mdo sde): zung 'di gyon la gcer bur ma 'dug shig/ de nas khye'u snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smraso// ko'u shi ka byung
