354b2(mdo sde): rnams la gnod par sems pa legs pa ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa tsam du/ phangs par 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ming
354b3(mdo sde): gis rnyed pa 'tshe ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yang dag par bsgrub pa gnas pa'i rnyed pa ni legs pa'o// lha'i bu ji ltar na ji tsam du// de bzhin
354b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'gal ba de tsam du thams cad legs pa ma yin pa'o// ji tsam du de bzhin gsheg nges pa'i bka' dang mthun pa de tsam thams cad legs
354b5(mdo sde): pa'olha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci lag so zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson nam 'on te/ le/ gas pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson/ 'jam
354b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho ba ni leg so zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin/ legs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
354b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu kho bo ni chos thams cad la brtson pa ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci/ dge ba'i chos la mi brtson nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni
354b8(mdo sde): dag pa'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin/ mi dge pa'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge ba zhes bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas// mi dge pa zhes bya ba'ang
355a1(mdo sde): yang 'dus byas so// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'di yang 'di 'dus byaso// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci/ 'dus ma byas pa 'am/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 
355a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu gal te 'dus byas kyis skrag pa lta na ni/ kho bo 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci/ 'dus byos kyis mi skrag gam// 'jam dpal
355a3(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te yang dag par 'dus byas kyi yongasu grub pa zhig mthong na ni/ kho bo 'dus byas kyis skrag par 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci khyod kyis
355a4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'dus byas kyi yongasu grub pa ma mthong dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni yang dag par 'dus byas kyi yongasu grub pa ma mthong ste/ 
355a5(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyi yang ma yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus byas su gtogs sam 'on te 'dus ma byas su gtogs/ 'jam dpal gyis
355a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni 'dus byasu gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma bya su gtogs pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te 'dus bya su gtogs par gyur na ni/ 
355a7(mdo sde): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus ma byasu gtogs par gyur na ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro// lha'i
355a8(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te khyod 'dus byas gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma bya su gtogs pa yang ma yin na/ khyod ji ltar shes par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
355b1(mdo sde): bta lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas sbrel pa 'dus byasu gtogs sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byasu gtogs/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
355b2(mdo sde): gshegs pas sprul pa 'dus bya su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byasu gtogs pa yang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
355b3(mdo sde): sprul pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji 'dra 'dra ba mams shes par gyis shig/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/ gzugs
355b4(mdo sde): la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa de ci tshe// dar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la gan sa sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa de ci 'du byas la
355b5(mdo sde): gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa de ci 'dus ma byas la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smra sa pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang
355b6(mdo sde): la gnas/ smras pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gang la yang mi gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
355b7(mdo sde): par shes pa gang la gnas de la kho bo gnas par shes par bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i
355b8(mdo sde): bu de bzhin nyid kyi 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa gang yin pa de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gro ba ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho
356a1(mdo sde): yang de ltar 'ongs pas/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo yang de ltar gnas ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i
356a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra ste/ ngas na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid sems med cing zhi ba'i phyir/ 'jam dpal yang sems med/ 
356a3(mdo sde): cing zhi ba ste/ des ni kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin nyid ni/ 
356a4(mdo sde): lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis rnamasu btsal bar bya'o// / lha'i bus smras pa/ lta bar song ba drug cu rtsag/ nyis po rnams gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis
356a5(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis pa ngag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi khrugs pa'i chos can gyis rnam par grol ba las btsal bar bya'o// 
356a6(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
356a7(mdo sde): grol ba ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnamasu btsal bar bya'o// lho'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa
356a8(mdo sde): dang / bsam pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yul du'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal
356b1(mdo sde): bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam
356b2(mdo sde): dpal khyod ji ltar 'dir shes pa nyung bar 'gyur ba de ltar pur ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni sus kyang / kun shes pa 'am/ rnam
356b3(mdo sde): par shes par mi nus so// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chags pa med pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ brjod du med pa/ bsnyad du med pa/ sbyor ba med
356b4(mdo sde): pa ta tshig med pa/ sems dang yid dang / rnam par das pa dang bral ba ste/ de sus kyang kun shes par daram/ rnam par shes par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i
356b5(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun shes par bya ba ma yin na/ nyan thos 'di dag gis kun shes par ga la 'gyur/ byang
356b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyang / phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par ga la 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang yi ge rnams kyis ye shes de bstan pa 'di ni/ 
356b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thobs ste/ ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper ni/ me gtsubs pa las me mi 'byung gi/ gtsub shing gtsubs pa las ma
356b8(mdo sde): 'byung ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gal te thog ma kho nar/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ sems can gang gis kyang de bzhin/ 
357a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ye shes de/ kun shes par mi 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gtsub shing gi gtam gyis/ ye shes de bstan te/ ye shes de ni yi ge med
357a2(mdo sde): pa'o/ ta lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gtsub shing gi gtam gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang ci yang rung ste/ sdom pa dang yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam dang / pa
357a3(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i gtam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam 'di ni gtsub shing gi gtam zhes pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gtsub shing
357a4(mdo sde): gri gtam ma yin pa'i gtam gang / 'jam dpal gyi/ sa smras pa/ lha'i bu gtam gang smra ba dang / 'jig/ po dang / gnas pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang / 'dren pa dang // 
357a5(mdo sde): sel ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang / gtam gang kun na sa nyon mongs pa yongasu brjod pa'i gtam ma yin ba dang / rnam par byang ba'i phan yon gyi gtam ma yin
357a6(mdo sde): ba dang / gtam gang 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar bya ba'i gtam ma yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i gtam dang / gtam gang yongs
357a7(mdo sde): su shes par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang gtam gang thob par bya ba'i phyir ma
357a8(mdo sde): yon mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa 'di na lha'i bu dag pa/ snying po yong po'i gtam mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gtam 'di lta bu rjod pa'i tshe/ mgo gas
357b1(mdo sde): mi rtsal bar bya ba'i phyir// bdud sdig can 'dir mi 'ong ba ngo mtshar to// tshig de smras nas/ ring por ma lon pa de'i mod la bdud sdig to can/ steng gi bar snang sprin chen po 'khrug
357b2(mdo sde): par mngon par sprul nas/ sgra chen po'i nga ro phyung ba dang / ngas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dngang skrag nas/ sgra skad kyi nga ro 'di lta bu 'di su zhig gis snyam mo// de nas
357b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis bdud sdig can gyi 'gyur ba mthong ngam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ 
357b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mthong leg so// bde bar go shig/ sa pa mthong lag so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe bdud sdig to can bcing ba dam
357b5(mdo sde): pos bcings te/ sa'i steng du ltung ba de lta bu'i bas ma pa bsams pa dang / bdag ni bcings so// bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcingaso zhes sgra 'byin to// 
357b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can btsang ba 'di bas chas dam pa'i 'ching ba gzhan yod de/ des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khyod kyis khong du ma chud do// de yang gang zhe na// 
357b7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'ching ba dang / phyin ci log gi 'ching ba dang / sred pa dang / lta ba'i bcings pa ste/ sdig can 'di bas ches dam pa'i 'ching ba dam po gzhan
357b8(mdo sde): yin te/ ngas khyod rtag tu bcings kyang / khong du ma chud do// bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal thong shig dang / bdag gi gnasu 'gro'o// yang bdud kyi las mi bya'o// 'jam dpa
358a1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ sdig can/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyod kyis bya dgos na/ khyod ci'i phyir gtang / bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdud bdag ni/ sangs rgyas
358a2(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na/ bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can gang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa
358a3(mdo sde): bdud byed du gzhug pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab kyi shes pa rnam par sprul pa'o// gang sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa/ mdzad
358a4(mdo sde): pa 'di ni/ ngo mtshar ma yin te/ gang bdud sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa 'di na/ rab tu ngo mtshar to// de na sa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe gang
358a5(mdo sde): sdig can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang / sa sa rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byin gyi/ 
358a6(mdo sde): brlabs de lta bu byin gyi rlabs so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dag ci dang ci 'dod pa kho bo la dros shig dang / kho bos dris pa lung bstan pas/ khyod
358a7(mdo sde): sems rangs par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smraso// de nas gnas btan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smraso// sdig can dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching / 
358a8(mdo sde): pa gang yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po/ bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o// zhe gnas de la chags pa
358b1(mdo sde): dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la snying por 'du shes pa dang lta bar song ba rnams la bstsal bar 'du shes pa
358b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma meng ba la snying por 'du shes pa dang / mtshan ma rnams la bsngal par 'du shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / smon lam la bsngal par
358b3(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / 'khor ba la bskul bar 'du shes pa 'di dag ni/ brdzun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnal 'byor spyod/ 
358b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'ching ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po lta bar song ba bstsal nas/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ lta bar song
358b5(mdo sde): nyid stong pa nyid do// mtshon ma bstsal nas/ mchi/ ni maM med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ mchu na ma'i ngo bo nyid mtshan ma med pa'o// smon lam
358b6(mdo sde): bskul nas/ smon pa med pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid smon pa med pa'o// 'khor ba bstsal nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa bsgom par bya ba ma
358b7(mdo sde): yin gyi / 'khor bar dmigs pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o// btsun pa 'od srung chen po mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'du shes dang / rlom sems dang / mtshan ma
358b8(mdo sde): la dmigs pa thams cad la mi spyod pa te/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / bang pa las ma yin gyi/ rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das
359a1(mdo sde): pa'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis dge slong
359a2(mdo sde): de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa dag sus btul/ dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ gang thob pa yang med la/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang med paso// / 
359a3(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ brtul ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ ji ltar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ chung zad kyang khrid pa yang mang / ma khrid pa yang med do// ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du
359a4(mdo sde): shes pa dang / bskyed pa yang med/ bkag pa yang me dad de/ mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ltar bdag cag btul to// dge slong de dag gis bstan pa 'di bshad// 
359a5(mdo sde): pa na ta lha'i bu stong nyis brgya chos rnams la chos kyi/ mig rdul med cing dri mi dang bral ba rnam par da/ ga go/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis/ gzhan yang
359a6(mdo sde): bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras// sdig can ji ltar na dge sbyong sbyin gnas yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor nam dge slong lon pa yang med de/ nod pa
359a7(mdo sde): yang mid la/ dad cing dang ba thams cad las yongasu sprod pa na'o// btsun pa rab 'byor gang dge slong gang ma byin pa de la sgyu ma'i blo dang / gang len pa de la mig yor gyi blo
359a8(mdo sde): dang nye bar len pa'i sems dang / nye bar len pa med po'i sems kyis kyang / yongasu mi spyod pa'i dge slong de lta bu ni sbyin gnas yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ 
359b1(mdo sde): sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa med par gsungs pa gang yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gang la rten nas/ shin tu/ 
359b2(mdo sde): zad pa'i phyir/ zad pa yang zad par mi byed/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ ma skyes pa yang mi skyed / myong ba med pa yang myong bar mi byed de/ chos thams cad kyang rang / 
359b3(mdo sde): bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes la/ shes nas kyang tshong po thams tsod 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug cing / mnyam par yang mthong la/ 
359b4(mdo sde): chung zad kyang mthong ba yang mang / mi mthong ba yang med pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrug nges pa med par gsungs pa'o// mo'u dgal gyi bus
359b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na/ dge slong sems thams/ cad la dbang thob pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po// nam dge slong chos
359b6(mdo sde): thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid du shos la/ rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhon pa yang med cing / sems gzod ma nas rnam par grol
359b7(mdo sde): ba shes la/ 'ching bar yang mi byed/ grol par yang mi byed/ sems gzugs med pas/ chos thams cad gzugs med par shes/ sems gnas pa med pas// 
359b8(mdo sde): chos thams cad gnas pa med por mthong / sems 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad 'dzin pa med par shes kyang / sems kyis sems shes pa yang med la/ sems
360a1(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin yang shes shing / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis/ gzhan gyi ding
360a2(mdo sde): la mi 'jog par dbang thob pa ni mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa yin te/ btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dge slong de lta bu ni sems thams cad la dbang thob pa yin no// 
360a3(mdo sde): gang pos smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na dge slong yongasu dag par chos ston pa yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po/ nam dge slong gis gzhan las chos thams cad/ 
360a4(mdo sde): shas kyang / gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i sems la ma dngon par zhan pa yang med/ chos thams cad kyang sgro btags par yang ston yi ge dang skad dang dbyangs dang // 
360a5(mdo sde): tshig gi lam thams cad kyang brag cha lta bur shes// chos nyan pa thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta/ ra mthong // gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig lus kyi rnam
360a6(mdo sde): par rig byed kyang chu zla dang 'dra bar mthong / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongasu rtog pa las byung bar shes/ chos 'ga' zhig gzung ba'i phyir ram/ dor ba'i phyir ram/ shin tu
360a7(mdo sde): bzla ba'i phyir ram/ thob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos mi ston/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po rnams la yang dbang thob cing le gso zhes bya ba la yang rab med la/ zang zing
360a8(mdo sde): med par chos ston cing / rang gi sems rang bzhin gyis yongasu dag pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis yong su dag por shes te/ sems kyi rang bzhin
360b1(mdo sde): yongasu dag par shes nas/ phung po'i bdud la dben par mthong ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la bcos mar 'du shes pa dang / 'chi bdag gi bdud la ma skyes pa dang / mi skye
360b2(mdo sde): bar gnas pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud la g.yo ba dang / rlom sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa yin te/ dge slong de lta bu ni yongasu dag par chos ston pa yin no// nye bar 'al
360b3(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na dge slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye ba 'khor/ dge slong gis nam chos thams cad shin tu dul bar shes te/ 
360b4(mdo sde): nyes pa rnams kyi thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben pa'i mthar shes te/ nyes pa byung ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa yang sel cing / dam por mi byed de/ de dag la gang
360b5(mdo sde): gis mtshams med pa rnams kyang rnam par gnon na/ cho ga dang tshul khrims la log par zhugs pa phra na tshegs lta bus kyang ci dgos pa/ de lta bu'i chos kyi
360b6(mdo sde): tshul gyi rnam pa yang nye bar bsgrub/ nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la yang mkhas/ blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la yang kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa ma yin pa dang 'byung bar
360b7(mdo sde): 'du shes/ nyon mongs par nang du yang mi ston/ phyi rol du yang ma yin gnyi ga med par yang ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa khong du chud pa nyid/ nyon mongs pa med par shes shing / 
360b8(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa yang mi sel/ nyon mongs pa med pa yang mi bsgrub/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sprin dang / char sprin 'dra bar shes te/ ye shes dang lhag mthong gi rlung gis
361a1(mdo sde): btor nas/ phyogs dang yul du 'gro ba yang med gnas pa yang med pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chu zla dang 'dra ste/ yongasu rtogs pa'i gzugs brnyan
361a2(mdo sde): gyis te bzhin nye bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni mun pa'i spyod yul te/ shes rab kyi sgron mas mi snang ba snang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom
361a3(mdo sde): snyun dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang 'dra ste/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pas brtags ni gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni glags
361a4(mdo sde): tshil ba ste/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas la// phal ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa// dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par
361a5(mdo sde): mi byed pas/ su nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar sa te/ sems can nyon mongs pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag
361a6(mdo sde): med pa dang / sems can med pa mngon sum du gyur pa na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang dag pa zhes bya'o// de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis/ rang rang gi 'dod pa bdud
361a7(mdo sde): sdig can da la kun dris nas/ bdud sdig can gyis kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la bab po bstan pas sems rangs par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs
361a8(mdo sde): 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
361b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshad zin gyis/ khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig/ sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa
361b2(mdo sde): dang / bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu mtshams bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu nyi shu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag
361b3(mdo sde): phul yin no// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor spyod pa/ rnam par grol ba 'dod cing / 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la snyen pa dang / sten pa dang / bsnyen bkur
361b4(mdo sde): byed pa ni bdud kyi las so// stong pa nyid la so sor / dag cing / sems can yal bar 'dor ba yang ba/ dud kyi la so// 'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing // 
361b5(mdo sde): 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongasu skyo ba yang ba dud kyi las so// bsam gtan skyed cing // bas ma gtan las rnam par ldeg pa tshol ba yang bdud/ 
361b6(mdo sde): kyi las so// chos ston kyang chos nyan po rnams la snying rje chen po mi skyed pa yang bdud kyi las so// yon tan dang ldan pa dang / sbyin gnas tshol zhing / tshul khrims
361b7(mdo sde): 'chal ba rnams la khro ba yang bdud kyi laso// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing / zag pa chen po'i gtam 'chab pa yang bdud kyi laso// zab mo'i gtam
361b8(mdo sde): 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa yang bdud kyi laso// byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongasu mi tshol ba yang bdud kyi laso// rab tu
362a1(mdo sde): brtson pa'i bsngags pa brjod kyang / sems can gyi brtson pa rnams mngon par mi sbyor ba yang bdud kyi las so// dge ba'i rtsa ba stsogs kyang byang chub kyi sems
362a2(mdo sde): mngon tu mi byed pa yang bdud kyi las so// lhag 'thong gi rnal 'byor dang ldan par gnas kyang / sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa yang bdud kyi las
362a3(mdo sde): so// nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad par tshol zhing / 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la smod pa'ang bdud kyi las so// shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad cing / snying rje
362a4(mdo sde): chen po la dmigs pa mi 'dzin pa yang bdud kyi las so// thabs dang mi ldan par dge bar spyod pa tham/ sa cad kyang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde
362a5(mdo sde): snod mi tshol gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang chu ga 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi la so// mang du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes ngogs ste/ chos la phre 'o dpe' mkhyud
362a6(mdo sde): byed pa 'ang bdud kyi laso// 'jig rten pa 'ang dgos pa'i zhal ta byed cing mang du thos pa mi tshol ba'ang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la
362a7(mdo sde): yang dag par zhugs pa skal ba mnyam pa rnams la mi sten/ mo snyan/ bsnyen bkur mi byed kyi/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ skal ba
362a8(mdo sde): mi mnyam pa la dga' ba'ang bdud kyi las so// gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong pa 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gis longs spyod
362b1(mdo sde): dang nor dang / rin po che dang / dbang phyug gi che ba nyid du gyur pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi che ba nyid dang ldan pa rnams la mi sten/ mi sten/ bsnyen bkur mi byed pa 'di dag ni/ lA'i
362b2(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la/ sdig can khyod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'
362b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdud kyi las 'di dag legs par bshad pa ni lagaso zhes/ legs zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dpa' gang dge bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing thos
362b4(mdo sde): nas kyang rnam par spong ba de dag/ byang chub yongasu smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'od lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying
362b5(mdo sde): rje chen po dang / 'khor ba na yongasu mi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa da// nga / sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / 
362b6(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa rnams nyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang skal pa mnyam pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs po dang / mtshan
362b7(mdo sde): par shes pa dang / chos ma thos pa nyan pa dang / tshe rab tshe rab su byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang bar rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang / dal pa phun
362b8(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi shes pas/ sems cani sdus cing / yongasu 'dzin pa dang / dam par chos ma/ 
363a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / g.yo med cing sgyu med pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongasu gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa te/ 
363a2(mdo sde): byang chub yongasu smin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu pi 'di dag thob par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smra so// sdig can
363a3(mdo sde): khyod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis leg so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni/ sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig legs/ 
363a4(mdo sde): par rnyed da/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na// mi gang 'byung po babs pas bstan pa de ni/ mi de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur bar
363a5(mdo sde): blta'o// lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo yang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs nas ston gyi/ 'bil ba'i skye bu ma du ni ma blta'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod/ 
363a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas kyi seng ga'i khri la 'dug te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing / chos ston pas dga' bar gyur tam/ bdud kyis
363a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ khod kyis ni kho bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na/ kho bo ni bcing ba dam pos bdag bcings par shes so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur/ 
363a8(mdo sde): pa la/ bzod pa gsol cig dang / de nas gtong bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bdud kyis lha'i bu mchims bzangs la 'di skad ces smras// 
363b1(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod par gsol mi dgos so// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la 'khrug
363b2(mdo sde): pa med/ khro ba med pa'i phyir ro// gang dag 'khrugs cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa
363b3(mdo sde): ci 'dra te bdud kyis smras po/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyis ste/ rnam pa bcu gnyis gang zhes na/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ma ma yin pas
363b4(mdo sde): bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'o sems kyi sa lhag pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad la mi slu bas/ g.yo med pa'i bzod pa dang / 
363b5(mdo sde): dbul zhing phongs pa yongasu skyob pas snying brtse zhing snying / rje ba'i bzod pa dang / ldog pa med pas/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang / lta bar sob
363b6(mdo sde): pa dang bral bas/ stong pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang / chos nyid la rton pas chos nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / bdag med pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo'i rjes
363b7(mdo sde): su 'jug pas 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'thun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad rjesu srung bas ngo byed pa yang med la
363b8(mdo sde): mi 'thun pa'ang med pa'i bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir/ skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i bzod pa ste/ lha'i bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems
364a1(mdo sde): dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa rnam pa bcu gnyis so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod gal te bkrol na/ dga' bar 'gyur ram/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu la/ 
364a2(mdo sde): po dga' ste/ mchog tu dga'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smra so// 'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shig dang / rang
364a3(mdo sde): gi gnas su 'gro'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smraso// sdig can khyod su zhig gis bcings/ gang las dgrol/ bdud kyis smras
364a4(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni sus bcings mi shes// 'jadam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can khyod ji ltar brtsa dngas pa med pa la bcings par 'du shes pa de bzhin du/ 
364a5(mdo sde): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes/ mi sdug pa la
364a6(mdo sde): sdug par 'du shes/ gzugs med pa la gzugasu 'du shes/ tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed rnams med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa la tshor ba
364a7(mdo sde): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes par 'du sheso// sdig can khyod dgrol na gang nas dgrol// bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag ni gang las kyang mi dgrol// 
364a8(mdo sde): smras pa/ sdig can de bzhin du gang dag rnam par dgrol ba yang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes yongasu shes pa ma gtogs par/ gang las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ 
364b1(mdo sde): ba med de/ de dag yongasu shes pas rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byin gyis brlabs de bsdus pa dang / sdig can de'ang rang gi gzugs
364b2(mdo sde): dang ldan par bdag gis shes so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad smraso// sdig can khyod kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas pa lag so / 
364b3(mdo sde): legs bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po 'di ni kho bo'i yul ma yin gyis/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o// de nas lha'i bu mtsham
364b4(mdo sde): bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi ma rjod pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
364b5(mdo sde): paHlha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ sems canams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnamasu btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te sems can rnams nyon
364b6(mdo sde): mongs pas gzir ba med na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ gal te sems can rnams na bar ma gyur na/ sman pas
364b7(mdo sde): kyang bya bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
364b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gang byung na sangs rgyas 'byung / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu skye ba dang rga ba dang na pa dang / 'chi ba byung na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
365a1(mdo sde): de dag spang ba'i don du sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ chos bskyed
365a2(mdo sde): pa de gang chos bkag pa gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyas nas/ chos gang yang bskyed pa yang med/ bkag pa yang med do// / 
365a3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// lho'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyi ngo// 
365a4(mdo sde): bo nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i chog bla dag so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sem sa dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// 'jam
365a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smos pa/ gang dmigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la yang kun tu mi spyod pa'o// lho'i bus smra sa pa/ ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs
365a6(mdo sde): pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs
365a7(mdo sde): pa yin/ \u0f7f'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor la/ sems can thams cad kyang yongasu mi gtong ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang
365a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du sgrub cing / sems can thams cad kya
365b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims la 'god la lhag pa'i bsams pas byang chub kyi sems kyang ma 'dor ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa
365b2(mdo sde): yon te'ajam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes nas/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang / khro ba dang thab snang ba'i
365b3(mdo sde): phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho ga mi 'dor ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
365b4(mdo sde): pa tanam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i chos da ni/ 'di lta ste/ dabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de
365b5(mdo sde): nyid shin tu yang dag par rjesu ma mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus gcas pa yang mi 'dong ba'o// lha'i bus smras
365b6(mdo sde): pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par
365b7(mdo sde): shes kyang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum
365b8(mdo sde): tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rgyu bo med po thob par gyur te/ spros pa thams cad dang bral zhing / sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spang ba'i phyir/ shes
366a1(mdo sde): rab kyis rnam par spyod na ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
366a2(mdo sde): byams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongasu mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji
366a3(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems snying rje la gnas pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la las kyi rnam par smin pa med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus
366a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ na ma chos thams cad la dga' ba yang mi skyed la/ mi
366a5(mdo sde): dga' ba ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ na mo chos thad
366a6(mdo sde): la gnyis dang bral bar gyur pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam
366a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur gyur pa med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
366a8(mdo sde): nam byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyis mchog yin/ 'jam
366b1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad gzung ba med pa dang / gzhi med par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go ca chen po bgos pa yin// 
366b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam par thos nas/ mi dngas/ mi skrag/ sgeg par mi 'gyur zhing / go ca chen po mi 'dor
366b3(mdo sde): ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nges pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad ring du srid pa ma yin la/ 
366b4(mdo sde): srid pa'i bag la nyal gyi nye bar bsnyen pa yang ma yin pa na'o// // lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dang / 'a 'grogs na bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
366b5(mdo sde): nam bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas/ lus dang ngag dang / yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mi byed pa na'o// lha'i/ bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka'
366b6(mdo sde): blo bde ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing / tshig ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub
366b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'thun par 'dzin pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi sems dang 'thun pa'i phyir/ sems thams cad kyi bsgo ba la mi 'gyur zhing sems can tha~Md dang / 
366b8(mdo sde): 'thun par gnas pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam
367a1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir/ nang yang nye bar ni la phyi rol du rgyu ba la yang rgyu ba na'o// lnga'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
367a2(mdo sde): dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chags pa thams cad la yang spyod la/ chags pa thams cad la zhen pa yang med pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar
367a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba btan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi bcod pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems
367a4(mdo sde): dpa' byas pa gzo ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras dpa/ nam ji ltar byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chung mig son pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub
367a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' byas pa shes pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sem
367a6(mdo sde): dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi 'dod la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar yang
367a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chog shes pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi shes pas/ chos
367a8(mdo sde): gang yang mi len pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngoms pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab la
367b1(mdo sde): yang gnas la 'jig rten pa'i rgyu bas kyang sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dben pa yin/ 'jam
367b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ nam nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis kyang / kun nis nyon mongs par mi 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/ brtson par
367b3(mdo sde): yang snang ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang dga' rang dbang can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam zag pa med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas
367b4(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad du snang ste/ ye shes kyi dbang byed kyi nyon mongs pas dbang byed pa ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
367b5(mdo sde): mang du thos pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag nyid kyang ma thos pa'i chos nyin cing ga zhin la yang ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa na'o// 
367b6(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam dmigs pa thams cad las 'byung ba rab tu shes
367b7(mdo sde): kyang chos thams cad 'phros par yang mi byed/ mi 'phros par yang mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub pa snying por byed pa yin// 
367b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam gzhan dang 'brel ba'i rnam par rig pa mi skyed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dben par yang rtog la/ rang gi sem
368a1(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa la yang mi lta zhing / bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pas bsgrub pa snying por byed pa ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
368a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' thos pa thams cad kyang 'dzin la/ sems can
368a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbang po rnams la mtshungs pa rab tu 'byed cing / sgra skad brag ca dang mtshungs par shes nas/ mngon par zhen pa med pa na ste/ da ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
368a4(mdo sde): gzungs dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal
368a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis bshad pa'i don 'di sus kun shes par 'gyur// / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dang ga dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin par gyur pa/ 
368a6(mdo sde): sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa/ dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ dmigs pa med par spyod pa dag gis/ kho bos bshad pa'i don 'di kun shes par 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 
368a7(mdo sde): de dag ci la mos par 'gyur// bsam pa ni gang / 'dzom dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag ni zab mo la mos par 'gyur te/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa ni bsams pa'o// lha'i
368a8(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyis/ 
368b1(mdo sde): bgod pa gcig pu'i lam du skom ste/ gnyi su med pas 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bskyod pa gcig pu'i lam gyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing / 
368b2(mdo sde): ma rig pa dang srid pa dang / srid pa las 'byung ba yang tshol la/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa las 'byung ba la so sor rtog pa ni/ ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred
368b3(mdo sde): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol bar shes pa na ste/ de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang nam dge slong 'dod chags kyi
368b4(mdo sde): mtha' la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / 8'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' rang bzhin yang 'dod chagasu shes pa dang / zhe sdang gi mtha' la zhe sdang
368b5(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i mthar shes shing / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i/ mtha'i rang bzhin yang zhe sdang du shes pa dang / gti mug gi mtha' la ti mug dang bral ba'i mthar
368b6(mdo sde): shes shing / gti mug dang bral ba'i mtha'i rang bzhin yang gti mug du 'du shes pa na ste/ de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang nam
368b7(mdo sde): dge slong sdug bsngal yongasu shes par mi byed/ kun 'byung ba spong bar mi byed/ 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed/ lam sgom par yang mi byed la/ sdug bsngal mi skye
368b8(mdo sde): bar shes pas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rje su rtogs ste/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa de la kun 'byung ba gang la yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes
369a1(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de la/ 'gog pa yang med/ sdug bsngal mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa du la/ lam gang yang med pa de ltar dge slong tshul bzhin la brtson
369a2(mdo sde): ba ni chos gang yang skyed par mi byed/ 'gag par yang mi byed/ gnas par yang mi byed do// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa med pa de 'dus ma
369a3(mdo sde): byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin yang 'phags pa rnams kyi bden par bsgom ste/ lha'i bu de ltar na dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// de nas bdud sdig can
369a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ gdong mchi mas/ gang zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du tshig 'di sa dad ces smraso// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa
369a5(mdo sde): da ni/ bdud rnams kyi skabs med do// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag bdud kyi las thams cad bkag par 'gyur ro zhes de skad smras nas/ 
369a6(mdo sde): bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/ yid la bcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyu ro// de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 
369a7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis bshad pa'i don ji ltar bdag gis shes pa lta na/ de nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul zab mo 'di thos nas spong ba'i dge slong
369a8(mdo sde): de dag gi rab tu byung ba med do// bsnyen par rdzogs pa med do// lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'dis skrag par 'gyur ba'i khyim pa de dag gi ston pa de bzhin
369b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa yi ma yin no// dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mchog tu zab pa 'di bos nas/ mi
369b2(mdo sde): skrag mi dngang la dngang bar mi 'gyur zhing / mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces
369b3(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// lha'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i tshul mtsho
369b4(mdo sde): tu zab pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang la dngang par mi 'a gyur zhing / mos par 'gyur ba de dag rnam par grol ba nyid du rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa 'dis
369b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa dag yang / dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa dang / bzod pa 'dis nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas thams
369b6(mdo sde): cad nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'od mang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
369b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ bdud 'dul ba'i le'u zhes bya bar
369b8(mdo sde): yang zung shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu 'od ma po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / 
370a1(mdo sde): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa 'jam dpa'
370a2(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba thag pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / 
370a3(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+ha ye shasau sdes bsgyur ci zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ 
370a4(mdo sde): Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi hA ra nA ma ma hA yA na su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
370a5(mdo sde): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis wa~M sa pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i kha/ ba kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi
370a6(mdo sde): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig tu zhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pa 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag
370a7(mdo sde): 'jog las bzhengs nas/ 'khor mang pos yongasu bskor cing // mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'chag cing / dge slong lnga brgya
370a8(mdo sde): po thams cad kyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung ste/ gnas brtan shA ri'i bu'i gnas khang ga la ba dar song ste phyin nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ gnas brtan
370b1(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas/ bsam gtan byed par mthong ngo // mthong nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa shA ri'i bu
370b2(mdo sde): khyod bsamo gtan byed dam smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam
370b3(mdo sde): gtan byed dam/ 'on te ma spangs pa rnams sprang pa'i phyir bsam gtan byed dam/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'das pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on tom 'ongs
370b4(mdo sde): pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te da da ltar byung ba la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la gnas te/ bsam
370b5(mdo sde): gtan byed dam/ 'on te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod
370b6(mdo sde): mig la gnas/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la
370b7(mdo sde): gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ ci btsun pa shA ro'i bu khyod 'dod pa'i kham
370b8(mdo sde): la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/ 'on te gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ tso btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nang la
371a1(mdo sde): gnas te/ bsam gtan byed dum/ 'on tu pha rol la gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ 'on te byi nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed/ tsa btsun pa shA ra bu
371a2(mdo sde): lus la gnas te/ bsam gtan byang ngam/ 'on te sems lo gnas te/ bsam gtan byed/ shA ri'i bus smos pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ltar tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba dang / 
371a3(mdo sde): brjod pa med par gnas par bya ba'i phyir te/ de lta bu'i phyir bsam gtan byed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa 'am/ 
371a4(mdo sde): tshe 'di la ma yin pa la bde bor gnas pa 'am brjod pa/ dmed pa'i chos de dag dmigs sam/ shA ri'i bus skyes pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis chos gang dag tshe
371a5(mdo sde): la bde bar gnas pa 'am/ tshe 'di ma yin pa la brda bar gnas pa'i// chos de dag yang dag pa ru sumathong nang mi dmigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal
371a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i cho su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag rten cing gnas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu
371a7(mdo sde): gang de bzhin gshegs pas/ nyan thos rnams rab tu dben pa'i cho su gsungs pa gang yin na btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang la rten cing gnas/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
371a8(mdo sde): 'di la dge slong ni 'das pa la rten cing gnas so// ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas so// da ltar byung ba la brten cing gnaso// de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la rten cing gnas
371b1(mdo sde): par khong du chud par bya ste/ 'jam dpal chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben par gsungs pa yin te/ bdag chos de dag la rten cing gnas
371b2(mdo sde): so/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir 'di skad ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing rab tu dben
371b3(mdo sde): ba la gnas pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te sems kyi bar la gnas shing / rab tu dben pa la gnas zhes smra/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang
371b4(mdo sde): yod pa ma yin/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de ya/ nga yod pa ma yin/ gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin te/ de ltar chos de dag ni yod/ 
371b5(mdo sde): pa ma yin na/ ji ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bu de 'di ska da ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/ ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/ da ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas shes/ 
371b6(mdo sde): smras/ yod pa ma yin pa'i chos la ni gnas pa med do// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ci
371b7(mdo sde): yang ma yin/ gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang gi yang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te/ gang mi gnas pa de'i gnas dmigasu mang ngo // yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa/ 
371b8(mdo sde): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ces brjod cing kun tu gnas nas smra ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa'o// de co'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
372a1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid ni g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni nyams pa med pa'o// 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'o// 
372a2(mdo sde): smon pa med pa'o// yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmig su med/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmig su med/ gang da ltar byung ba'i
372a3(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid de yang dmig su med pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ sems kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de yang dmigasu med do// 'on kyang btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ma
372a4(mdo sde): gtogs par gang bstan pa'am/ rab tu bshad pa/ ra nus pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
372a5(mdo sde): pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos ston tam/ 'dzem dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin
372a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te/ chos ston/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos kyang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs ste/ 
372a7(mdo sde): chos ston/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/ chos thams cad kyang yod pa ma yin te/ 
372a8(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin te/ dmigasu med do// de'i chos bstan pa ni 'di 'dra ste/ 'di la dmigs pa 'am/ mi dmigs pa gnyis kyis rab tu
372b1(mdo sde): bye ba med do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa 'am/ mi brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod
372b2(mdo sde): ba yang dag par chad pa/ btags pa med pa/ gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'o// shA ri'i bus smras po/ 'jam dpal su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur// 
372b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur zhing yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par yang mi 'gyur ba/ 
372b4(mdo sde): de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang 'das pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das/ pa'i'o chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang / 
372b5(mdo sde): gang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun she
372b6(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba mi mthong zhing // de nye bar len par yang mi 'gyur ba de
372b7(mdo sde): chos bstan pa 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro// gang bdag dang / bdag med par yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang len pa dang / 'dor bar yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa
372b8(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur te/ da ni bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyuraro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis
373a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bshad pa 'di'i don shes par 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/ 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur zhes 'di skad 'dri/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 
373a2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal chos zab mo bstan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyung / 'di ni yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung ngo // 'jam dpal dgra bcom pa dang / slob pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyang sa/ 
373a3(mdo sde): phyogs 'di la sgyid lug par 'gyur na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa rnams la ni sa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
373a4(mdo sde): 'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang med na/ sa gang la dag dbacom pa gnas par 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni gnas med pas rab tu bya ba'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni dmig/ 
373a5(mdo sde): su med pas rab tu phye'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod ba dang mi brjod pa shin tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang
373a6(mdo sde): mi brjod pa yang dag par chad pa ste/ btags pa med pa'o// dgra bcom pa dag ni sar dbye ba dag dang bral ba/ 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o// 'jug pa med pa/ 'dus ma
373a7(mdo sde): byas kyis rab tu bya ba ste/ dgra ba tsam pa dag ni 'dus ma byas pa/ gnas pa med pa yin na/ ci zhig dgra bcom pa dag gi sar 'gyur/ dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis
373a8(mdo sde): rab tu phye ba ma yin no// byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par rtog go// ming dang gzugs de yang rtog pa med cing / rnam par rtog pa med par dgra bcom
373b1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis shes te/ de'i phyir dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no// byis pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/ byis pa'i chos dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgu btsa
373b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dmig so// nam mi dmigs pa de ni mi rtog go/ kun tu mi spyod do// de spyod pa med/ spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste/ yod do zhes khas mi len/ med do zhes pa
373b3(mdo sde): bar khas mi len/ yod kyang yod la med kyang med do zhes kha sa len yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi len to// nam khas mi len to// nam khos
373b4(mdo sde): mi len pa de na dmigs pa med do// da dmigs pa tha ma/ sa cad dang bral sems med cing sems dang bral ste/  gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis dge slong gi chos la gnas pa
373b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ 'khor de'i dge slong lnga brgya po stan las langs nas/ 'di skad ces 'jam dpal
373b6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa mi blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mnyan to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// de ci'i pir zhe na// 
373b7(mdo sde): 'di ltar 'dzem dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur bzhin du/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang // rnam par byang ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pas/ chos ma yin pa
373b8(mdo sde): smra'o zhes brjod nas/ de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod par spyad snyam
374a1(mdo sde): nas dong ngo // de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyi chos
374a2(mdo sde): kun shes par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag stan
374a3(mdo sde): las langs te/ 'phya smod mi snyan pa zer zhing dong ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag 'di skad ces/ 'jam dpal
374a4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa mau blta'o// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// 
374a5(mdo sde): zhes zer ba da ni/ leg so leg so// shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag gi tshig da ni legs par smras pa'o// de ts+tsha/ 'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
374a6(mdo sde): pa ni yod pa ma yin te/ dmig su med do// gang yod pa ma yin te/ dmig su med pa de la blta ba dang mnyan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na
374a7(mdo sde): gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yod pa ma yin te/ dmigasu med pas/ gang de'i gnas kyang yod pa ma yin te/ 
374a8(mdo sde): dmig su med do// gang yod pa yang ma yin te/ dmigasu med pa de ni bsten par bye ma yin no// de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa/ 
374b1(mdo sde): 'di thos pa dang / slar phyogs der log nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal bdag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar mi shes so// 
374b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dag legaso lag so// de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyis bya ste/ dge slong dag 'do la ni kun shes par bya ba med/ rnam par
374b3(mdo sde): par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa nyid do// chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de dbyings ma yin no// da ni yod
374b4(mdo sde): pa ma yin te dmig su med cing / g.yo ba med la 'tsho 'pho med do// gang g.yo ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa de kun shes par bya ba ma yin/ rnam par shes par
374b5(mdo sde): bya ba ma yin no// gang kun shes par bya bar dang / rnam/ par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems med pa de ni ston pa'i nyan thos zhes bya/ mchog thob pa zhes bya/ 
374b6(mdo sde): gtso bo zhes bya/ sbyin gnas zhes bya'o// bstan pa 'di beshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya po de dag las/ dge slong bzhi brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
374b7(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo// dge slong brgya ni sems cher 'khrugs nas lus nga nyid dang / sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du lhung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam/ 
374b8(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal khyod sems can rjesu srung ba'i chos mi ston pas// dge slong brgya po de dag chud zos te/ mtshar byaso// de nas
375a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu khyod de skad ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu dge slong brgyapo
375a2(mdo sde): de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod der reg pa thang cig reg nas/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang / skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyu ro// shA ri'i bu gal te dge slong de
375a3(mdo sde): dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na/ de dag gdon mi za bar sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/ las de zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na/ de
375a4(mdo sde): ngag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas/ ba skal par sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba 'i las/ de yang cung zad cig myong bar byas so// shA
375a5(mdo sde): ri'i bu de'i phyir/ dge slong brgya po de dag de bzhin ga shags pa byams pa'i nyon thos thog ma 'dus par dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i
375a6(mdo sde): bu de lta bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas/ thos po ni dam pa yin gyi/ bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs pas ni de lta ma yin/ tshad med pa
375a7(mdo sde): bzhis ni de lta ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms pas ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu da ma thos par 'khor// 
375a8(mdo sde): pa las yongasu ma grol/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams
375b1(mdo sde): las yongasu ma grol zhes bshad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras// 'jam dpal 'di ltar sems can yongasu smin
375b2(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad pa ngo mtshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni bri ba ma yin/ 
375b3(mdo sde): 'phel ba mo yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
375b4(mdo sde): yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmig su med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ gang gis
375b5(mdo sde): kyang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te/ gnas pa me do// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i mi 'ag/ la ba de byang chub bo// byang chub gang yin pa da ni thar
375b6(mdo sde): pa'o// thar pa gang yin pa rnam par mi rtog go/ gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni mi byed cing 'gyur ba med do// gang mi byed cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'o// / 
375b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin te/ de bzhin nyid ni
375b8(mdo sde): bri ba ma yin// 'phel ba ma yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// sems can gyi khams kyang bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin no// kun nas
376a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de na'i'aphyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag yod pa ma yin zhing dmig su med de/ tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/ 
376a2(mdo sde): gang gis kyang ma yin/ gang la yang mi gnas te/ gnas pa med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs
376a3(mdo sde): dang ta tangad ltar byung ba'i chos brjod pas// don gyis ma yin tha snyad tsam 'am// gcig dang sna tshogs mtshan nyid min// mtshan nyid med par gang rtog pa// de dag nyid ni mtshan nyid
376a4(mdo sde): 'gyuratematshan nyid med la rtog pa med// rtog pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid min// 'dus ma byas la gang rtog/ dang // mya ngan 'das la gang rtag pa// gnyis ga bdu
376a5(mdo sde): kyi las yin zhes// de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad// phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams// de dag ming gi/ sa brjod pa ste// ming dang skye med gang yin pa// de gnyis
376a6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig pa yin// tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa// de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no// mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste// stong pa ji bzhin spyod yul lo// gang dag rtog pa de dag
376a7(mdo sde): g.yo/ rtog pa med pa g.yo ba med// rtog pa rnams kyis g.yo bar 'gyur// rtog pa med par mya ngan 'dara'// gang gis rang bzhin 'di shes pa// de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya// 
376a8(mdo sde): dephyir zad pa rje su thob// de ni rtog med ye shes so// ye shes kyis ni ye shes brjod// ye shes brjod pa rnams kyang gsog// ye shes 'di ltar gang bzod pa// de ni ye shes
376b1(mdo sde): ldan zhes bya// gang gis stong gsum 'di dag rnams// rin chen bkang ste byin pa bas// gang gis dam chos 'di 'dra la// bzod pa de ni bzod pa'i mchog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam
376b2(mdo sde): yas su// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsnyen pas ni// mdo sde 'di dang mtshungs ma yin// chos 'di dang ni theg pa 'di// yang dag rdzogs pa'i
376b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gsungs// mdo sde 'di la rten byas na// thams cad de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na// srog chags 'bum ni chos rnams la
376b4(mdo sde): chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par da dag go// dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// gzugs na
376b5(mdo sde): spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri ni bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ de da/ ga thams cad bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la/ 
376b6(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// de dog thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par
376b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog ces bya bar ming 'thun par 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis da skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 
376b8(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
377a1(mdo sde): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
377a2(mdo sde): rdzogs s+ho// / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la ngab// 
377a3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du// Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ni rje sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bsten pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
377a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cing la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan
377a5(mdo sde): yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang
377a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos
377a7(mdo sde): ston to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcu 'khor ba tsam thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad na 'dzin
377a8(mdo sde): cing 'dug go/ de nas yongs su dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu mtshams bzangs shes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'khor
377b1(mdo sde): dang bcas te/ 'khor danyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa stan las las te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas byin pa dang / yajam ngapas
377b2(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mdzad pas/ dadung thugs ma tshim lags sam/ 'jam
377b3(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rgya mtsho chen po chu zad pas chog par 'dzin par 'gyur snyam 'am/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
377b4(mdo sde): de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras dpa// lha'i bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa 'i ye shes rgya mtsho chen po lta bu zab cing gting dpag
377b5(mdo sde): dka' la dpag tu med pa yongs su tshol bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas/ 
377b6(mdo sde): gzhan yang chog par 'dzin par mi bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi/ 'jam
377b7(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dmigs pa bzhis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi
377b8(mdo sde): sems la dmigs pa dang / sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mo 'chad par bya ba la
